Original Text: Politie pakt actrice Carice Van Houten en honderden anderen op bij protestactie Extinction Rebellion in Den Haag In Nederland heeft de politie zaterdag bij een blokkade van de A12 in Den Haag uiteindelijk meer dan 1580 klimaatactivisten opgepakt Onder hen ook bekende namen zoals actrice Carice Van Houten
Translated Text: Police picks up actress Carice Van Houten and hundreds of others at protest campaign Extinction Rebellion in The Hague On Saturday, in a blockade of the A12 in The Hague, the police finally picked up more than 1580 climate activists among them also known names such as actress Carice Van Houten

Original Text: IN BEELD Verdriet in Dortmund feest bij Bayern zo beleefden Duitse fans de titelontknoping De Duitse slotspeeldag was een ware thriller In minuut 88 was Dortmund nog virtueel kampioen maar een minuut later scoorde Jamal Musiala tegen Köln de goal van de titel voor Bayern München In München mochten ze voor het elfde jaar op rij vieren in Dortmund vloeiden de tranen Ze waren o zo dichtbij
Translated Text: IN IMAGE Grief in Dortmund party at Bayern so German fans experienced the title ending The German closing game was a true thriller In minute 88 Dortmund was still virtual champion but a minute later Jamal Musiala scored against Köln the goal of the title for Bayern München In Munich they were allowed to celebrate for the eleventh year in a row in Dortmund the tears flowed.

Original Text: Lennert Van Eetvelt spoelt lastige periode door met ritzege in Alpes Isère Tour en is nieuwe leider Dit doet heel veel deugd Lennert Van Eetvelt Lotto Dstny heeft zaterdag de vierde etappe gewonnen van de Alpes Isère Tour een Franse beloftenkoers Voor Van Eetvelt was het zn eerste koers nadat hij op nonactief werd gezet voor het gebruik van een neusspray waar hij uiteindelijk voor werd vrijgesproken
Translated Text: Lennert Van Eetvelt flushes a difficult period with riding victory in Alpes Isère Tour and is a new leader This does a great deal of joy Lennert Van Eetvelt Lotto Dstny won the fourth stage of the Alpes Isère Tour on Saturday a French promise race For Van Eetvelt it was his first course after he was put on idle for the use of a nasal spray for which he was finally acquitted.

Original Text: Geraint Thomas is onder de indruk van Primoz Roglic na mokerslag in de tijdrit Hij heeft me gesloopt respect naar hem Na een ware thriller heeft Primoz Roglic de klimtijdrit naar Monte Lussari gewonnen Hij kwam met maar liefst 40 seconden voorsprong aan op Geraint Thomas wanneer Roglic ook de eindwinnaar wordt Rozetruidrager Geraint Thomas moet zijn leiderstrui op de voorlaatste dag zo alsnog afgeven Zelfs zn mechanisch probleem stopte hem niet dan verdien je te winnen klonk het sportief
Translated Text: Geraint Thomas is impressed by Primoz Roglic after slamming in the time trial He has demolished me respect for him After a true thriller Primoz Roglic has won the climbing time trial to Monte Lussari He arrived at Geraint Thomas with no less than 40 seconds lead when Roglic also becomes the final winner Rozetruidrager Geraint Thomas has to hand over his leading jersey on the penultimate day so yet Even his mechanical problem didn't stop him then you deserve to win it sounded sporty

Original Text: UITSLAG RONDE VAN ITALIË RIT 20 Ontketende Primoz Roglic kraakt Geraint Thomas in de klimtijdrit en wint op de voorlaatste dag de Giro De 106de Giro dItalia is van Primoz Roglic De 33jarige Sloveen deed op de beestig zware Monte Lussari leider Geraint Thomas kraken De Olympische kampioen van Tokio 2020 zette zijn achterstand van 26 seconden om in een voorsprong van 14 seconden Ondanks materiaalpech Er stond gewoon geen maat op een ontketende Rogla
Translated Text: RIGHT ROUND OF ITALY RIT 20 Primoz Roglic kicks Geraint Thomas in the climbing time trial and wins the Giro on the penultimate day The 106th Giro dItalia is from Primoz Roglic The 33 year old Sloveen did on the toughest Monte Lussari leader Geraint Thomas squatting The Olympic champion of Tokyo 2020 turned his gap of 26 seconds into a gap of 14 seconds Despite material trouble There was simply no measure on a unleashed Rogla

Original Text: Live Olivier Vandecasteele  Een knuffel als dank voor de minister Olivier Vandecasteele is aangekomen in België nadat hij meer dan een jaar in de cel in Teheran heeft gezeten Volg hier de laatste updates
Translated Text: Live Olivier Vandecasteele A hug as a thank you for Minister Olivier Vandecasteele has arrived in Belgium after spending more than a year in prison in Tehran Follow here the latest updates

Original Text: Liveblog Cannes  Franse regisseuse Justine Triet wint Gouden Palm met Anatomie dune chute In Cannes is de 76ste editie van het Festival International du Film afgelopen De Franse regisseuse Justine Triet won de Gouden Palm voor haar film Anatomie dune chute Lees hieronder de impressies van onze filmredacteur ter plaatse
Translated Text: Liveblog Cannes French director Justine Triet wins Golden Palm with Anatomy dune chute The 76th edition of the Festival International du Film ended The French director Justine Triet won the Golden Palm for her film Anatomy dune chute Read below the impressions of our film editor on the spot

Original Text: Uniek en eeuwenoud gezinsopvang voor psychiatrische zorgbehoevenden in Geel
Translated Text: Unique and ancient family care for psychiatric patients in Yellow

Original Text: Reuzegommers veroordeeld tot werkstraf wat voor werk moeten ze gaan doen en mogen ze zelf kiezen 400 euro boete en tot 300 uur werkstraf is dat nu justiceforSanda Er is veel commotie over de volgens de verdediging evenwichtige straffen die de Reuzegommers zijn opgelegd Maar wat houdt zon werkstraf nu eigenlijk in
Translated Text: Giant gummers sentenced to community service what kind of work they have to do and may choose for themselves 400 euros fine and up to 300 hours of community service is that now justiceforSanda There is a lot of commotion about the defense-balanced punishments imposed on the Giant gummers but what does that actually mean?

Original Text: Vader van zangeres Charlotte Adigéry na urenlange zoektocht teruggevonden vlak voor haar optreden Uren voor haar optreden op Core Festival moest Charlotte Adigéry 32 op zoek naar haar vader De man heeft alzheimer en was een tijdlang vermist in Gent Tegen de avond werd de man gelukkig gezond en wel teruggevonden zodat de zangeres kon optreden zoals gepland
Translated Text: Father of singer Charlotte Adigéry found after hours of searching just before her performance Hours before her performance at Core Festival Charlotte Adigéry 32 in search of her father The man has Alzheimer's and was missing for a while in Ghent By the evening the man was happily found healthy and well so the singer could perform as planned

Original Text: RECENSIE Elton John in het Sportpaleis het afscheid werd een magistrale verrijzenis Elton John eiste applaus en dwong staande ovaties af zaterdagavond in het Sportpaleis maar ook zo had hij ze gekregen Als een ruimteman verkende hij elke uithoek van het universum dat hij zelf schiep Nooit grotesk altijd groots
Translated Text: Recension Elton John at the Sports Palace farewell became a majestic resurrection Elton John demanded applause and forced standing ovations Saturday night at the Sports Palace but also so he had received them As a spaceman he explored every corner of the universe he created Never grotesque always grand

Original Text: Heerlijke goal van Chadli levert geen zege op tegen efficiënt AA Gent Westerlo heeft er een knap seizoen op zitten het afscheid van een thuispubliek was er eentje in mineur De Kemphanen kwamen na een sterk begin verdiend op voorsprong maar slikten finaal nog drie doelpunten van een efficiënt AA Gent
Translated Text: Delicious goal of Chadli does not win against efficient AA Gent Westerlo has a great season sitting on it the farewell of a home audience was one in minor De Kemphanen came after a strong start deserved on lead but finally swallowed three goals of an efficient AA Gent

Original Text: Ontketende Primoz Roglic kraakt Geraint Thomas middendoor in de klimtijdrit en wint op de voorlaatste dag de Giro De 106de Giro dItalia is van Primoz Roglic De 33jarige Sloveen plooide op de beestig zware Monte Lussari leider Geraint Thomas gewoon middendoor De Olympische kampioen van Tokio 2020 zette zijn achterstand van 26 seconden om in een voorsprong van 14 seconden Ondanks materiaalpech Er stond gewoon geen maat op een ontketende Rogla
Translated Text: Unchained Primoz Roglic cracks Geraint Thomas in the middle of the climbing time trial and wins on the penultimate day the Giro The 106th Giro dItalia is from Primoz Roglic The 33-year-old Sloveen folded on the gruesomely heavy Monte Lussari leader Geraint Thomas just midway through The Olympic champion of Tokyo 2020 turned his gap of 26 seconds into a 14-second gap Despite material trouble There was simply no measure on a unleashed Rogla

Original Text: Vandecasteele terug in België na spitsvondige ruiloperatie met Iraanse terrorist 2605 De Belg Olivier Vandecasteele is na bijna anderhalf jaar detentie in een Iraanse cel vrij en is vrijdag omstreeks 2130 uur geland op Melsbroek Opmerkelijk is dat hij geruild is met een voor terreur
Translated Text: Vandecasteele back in Belgium after clever exchange operation with Iranian terrorist 2605 The Belgian Olivier Vandecasteele is free after almost one and a half years of detention in an Iranian cell and landed at Melsbroek on Friday around 2130 hours Remarkable is that he was traded with one for terror

Original Text: Regering pakt fiscale verwarring over alternatief DBIbevek aan 2605 Met een voorontwerp van wet wil minister van Financiën Vincent Van Peteghem CDV komaf maken met de fiscale onduidelijkheid die heerst over de Luxemburgse tak6contracten waarmee Belgische bedrijven
Translated Text: Government tackles tax confusion about alternative DBIbevek to 2605 With a preliminary draft law, Minister of Finance Vincent Van Peteghem wants to remove CDV with the tax uncertainty that prevails over the Luxembourg branch6contracts with Belgian companies

Original Text: Het duivelse dilemma van De Croo 2605 Om te vermijden dat hij met de Vlaamse liberalen van te ver moet terugkomen gaat premier Alexander De Croo een jaar voor de verkiezingen al in campagnemodus Dat dreigt het regeringswerk en een akkoo
Translated Text: De Croo's diabolical dilemma 2605 In order to avoid having to come back with the Flemish liberals from too far, Prime Minister Alexander De Croo is already in campaign mode a year before the elections.

Original Text: Ontgoochelde Geraint Thomas Ik kan toch heel trots zijn Het heeft niet mogen zijn voor Geraint Thomas op de loodzware Monte Lussari In zijn roze trui werd de 37jarige Welshman toch nog van Girowinst gehouden door een ontketende Primoz Roglic G was achteraf een sportieve verliezer Roglic heeft me helemaal kapot gemaakt het is beter zo dan met één of twee seconden verliezen
Translated Text: Disillusioned Geraint Thomas I can be very proud It shouldn't have been for Geraint Thomas on the heavy Monte Lussari In his pink jersey the 37-year-old Welshman was still loved by a unleashed Primoz Roglic G was afterwards a sporty loser Roglic has completely destroyed me It's better than losing with one or two seconds

Original Text: Primoz Roglic Ongelooflijk dit zijn momenten om nooit te vergeten Na 3 eindzeges in de Ronde van Spanje zal Primoz Roglic zonder ongelukken een eerste eindzege in de Ronde van Italië aan zijn palmares kunnen toevoegen Ik had vandaag goeie benen maar al die fans gaven me nog wat extra watt
Translated Text: Primoz Roglic Unbelievable these are moments to never forget After 3 final victories in the Tour of Spain, Primoz Roglic will be able to add a first victory in the Tour of Italy to his palmares without accident I had good legs today but all those fans gave me some extra watts

Original Text: Lange rijen op Britse luchthavens door storing egates Passagiers die zaterdag arriveerden op luchthavens in het Verenigd Koninkrijk kregen te maken met lange wachtrijen vanwege een storing bij de elektronische paspoortcontrole Die is inmiddels opgelost
Translated Text: Long queues at British airports due to malfunction egates Passengers arriving at airports in the UK on Saturday were faced with long queues due to a malfunction at the electronic passport control which has now been resolved

Original Text: Bayern München ontslaat uur na veroveren titel directeuren Kahn en Salihamidzic Bayern München heeft bestuursvoorzitter Oliver Kahn en technisch directeur Hasan Salihamidzic de laan uitgestuurd Dat nieuws is een uur nadat Der Rekordmeister zich op sensationele wijze tot Duits kampioen kroonde bekendgemaakt
Translated Text: Bayern Munich fired Kahn and Salihamidzic Bayern Munich executive director Oliver Kahn and technical director Hasan Salihamidzic that news is an hour after Der Rekordmeister announced himself as German champion in a sensational manner

Original Text: Dortmund geeft Duitse landstitel op dramatische wijze weg aan Bayern München Borussia Dortmund heeft zaterdag op dramatische wijze de Duitse titel weggegeven aan Bayern München De ploeg van Donyell Malen speelde in de laatste speelronde gelijk tegen FSV Mainz 05 22 terwijl Bayern wel won bij FC Köln 12 Daarmee werd Der Rekordmeister voor de elfde keer op rij landskampioen
Translated Text: Dortmund gives German national title in a dramatic way to Bayern Munich Borussia Dortmund gave the German title to Bayern Munich The team of Donyell Malen played in the final round against FSV Mainz 05 22 while Bayern did win at FC Köln 12 With that Der Rekordmeister became national champion for the eleventh time in a row.

Original Text: Verstappen pakt in extremis pole voor Grand Prix van Monaco Pérez crasht Max Verstappen heeft zaterdag op de valreep poleposition gepakt voor de Grand Prix van Monaco De Nederlander troefde in zijn laatste poging Fernando Alonso af Esteban Ocon werd verrassend derde terwijl Sergio Pérez crashte
Translated Text: Verstappen gaakt in extremism pole voor Grand Prix van Monaco Pérez crashes Max Verstappen gaakt op de valreep poleposition voor de Grand Prix van Monaco The Dutch trumped in his last attempt Fernando Alonso af Esteban Ocon became surprisingly third while Sergio Pérez crashed

Original Text: Defeat would leave Russia brutal and vindictive even if Putin disappeared says RAF chief  as it happened Air Chief Marshall Sir Mike Wigston says Russian threat to UK could get worse if Putin was ousted This blog is now closed The intensity is increasing Ukraine says first steps in counteroffensive have begunDay 458 of Russias war against UkraineRussian forces have temporarily eased their attacks on the besieged eastern Ukrainian city of Bakhmut to regroup and strengthen their capabilities a senior Kyiv official said on SaturdayRussias Wagner private army began handing over its positions to regular Russian troops this week after declaring full control of Bakhmut after the longest and bloodiest battle of the war Reuters reported Continue reading

Original Text: Holly Willoughby says Phillip Schofield lied to her about affair with younger colleague This Morning copresenter wrote that subsequent admission of relationship he denied was very hurtful Holly Willoughby has claimed that former cohost Phillip Schofield had previously denied to her that he had a relationship with a younger ITV colleague and described his subsequent admission of the affair as very hurtfulIn a statement on Instagram the This Morning presenter 42 said Its taken time to process yesterdays news When reports of this relationship first surfaced I asked Phil directly if this was true and was told it was not Its been very hurtful to now find out that this was a lie Continue reading

Original Text: US debt ceiling talks continue into weekend amid signs deal is close Default deadline pushed to 5 June as work requirements for food aid recipients reportedly emerge as final sticking pointNegotiations over Americas looming debt crisis pushed into Saturday amid signs that a deal between Joe Bidens administration and Republicans was close to being struck even as the deadline for a potentially catastrophic US default was nudged by a few daysThe Associated Press reported that work requirements for federal food aid recipients have emerged as a final sticking point in talks even as Biden had said on Friday that a deal on raising the debt ceiling was very close Continue reading
Translated Text: US debt ceiling talks continue into weekend amid signs deal is close Default deadline pushed to 5 June as work requirements for food aid recipients reportedly emerge as final sticking pointNegotiations over Americas looming debt crisis pushed into Saturday amid signs that a deal between Joe Bidens administration and Republicans was close to being struck even as the deadline for a potentially catastrophic US default was nudged by a few daysThe Associated Press reported that work requirements for federal food aid recipients have emerged as a final sticking point in talks even as Biden had said on Friday that a deal on raising the debt ceiling was very close Continue reading

Original Text: Impeachment proceedings against scandalhit Texas attorney general begin Republicanled state house of representatives to debate whether to impeach Ken Paxton over allegations of briberyTexass Republicanled house of representatives launched historic impeachment proceedings against attorney general Ken Paxton on Saturday as the scandalplagued lawyer called on supporters to protest a vote that could lead to his ouster and Donald Trump came to his defenseThe house convened on Saturday afternoon to debate whether to impeach and suspend Paxton from office over allegations of bribery abuse of public trust and that he is unfit for office Theyre just some of the accusations that have trailed Texass top lawyer for most of his three terms Continue reading
Translated Text: Impeachment proceedings against scandalhit Texas attorney general begin Republicanled state house of representatives to debate whether to impeach Ken Paxton over allegations of briberyTexass Republicanled house of representatives launched historic impeachment proceedings against attorney general Ken Paxton on Saturday as the scandalplagued lawyer called on supporters to protest a vote that could lead to his ouster and Donald Trump came to his defenseThe house convened on Saturday afternoon to debate whether to impeach and suspend Paxton from office over allegations of bribery abuse of public trust and that he is unfit for office Theyre just some of the accusations that have trailed Texass top lawyer for most of his three terms Continue reading

Original Text: Primoz Roglic set to win Giro dItalia after seizing lead from Geraint Thomas Roglic beats Thomas by 40sec on stage despite slipping chainThomas Its pretty gutting but once it sinks in I can be proudGeraint Thomass Giro dItalia challenge crumbled as he wilted on the steep slopes of Monte Lussari in northeast Italy allowing his closest challenger Primoz Roglic to move into the race leaders maglia rosa by 14 secondsIn a nailbiting climax to the threeweek race the 186km individual time trial finally revealed just how strong Roglic of the JumboVisma team truly is He survived a disastrous moment midway through the stage when he slipped his chain on the steepest gradients Continue reading
Translated Text: Primoz Roglic set to win Giro dItalia after seizing lead from Geraint Thomas Roglic beats Thomas by 40sec on stage despite slipping chainThomas Its pretty gutting but once it sinks in I can be proudGeraint Thomass Giro dItalia challenge crumbled as he wilted on the steep slopes of Monte Lussari in northeast Italy allowing his closest challenger Primoz Roglic to move into the race leaders maglia rosa by 14 secondsIn a nailbiting climax to the threeweek race the 186km individual time trial finally revealed just how strong Roglic of the JumboVisma team truly is He survived a disastrous moment midway through the stage when he slipped his chain on the steepest gradients Continue reading

Original Text: Borussia Dortmund hand Bundesliga title to Bayern Munich with Mainz draw Afterwards not a single person went home The Borussia Dortmund players stood in front of the Yellow Wall in silence and the Borussia Dortmund fans acknowledged them in silence a ritual that felt funereal almost religious in its wrought penitence We the players beg forgiveness for taking a cheese grater to our faces for the last 90 minutes We the fans forgive you for taking a cheese grater to your faces And in your bloodied cheeks and gross bits of grated face we see and honour the measure of your sacrifice A little more silence The coach Edin Terzic was cryingMeanwhile about 60 miles down the A1 Bayern Munich were indulging in a more traditional title celebration The customary timehonoured kind The Bayern kind But this time for Dortmund there would be nobody else to blame Not Pep Guardiola or Robert Lewandowski or Uli Hoeness Not the big players who kept leaving for fresher pastures nor the bigger clubs who lured them there nor the financial inequities that enabled them Continue reading

Original Text: Max Verstappen edges out Fernando Alonso to take Monaco F1 GP pole Charles Leclerc third but is given threeplace grid penaltyLewis Hamilton fifth after Mercedes step in right directionNothing if not spectacular qualifying for the Monaco Grand Prix is the session of the weekend that surely stirs the heart the most On the narrow twisting streets of Monte Carlo against the backdrop of the lowering cliffs of the principality and framed against the looming walls of the circuit the suddendeath drama the tense gripping draw of the single lap challenge is surely nowhere writ more large On Saturday Monaco delivered on all the promise with a truly stunning denouementIt was Max Verstappen who took pole for Red Bull but only with the most magnificent final sector of his final lap to pip Fernando Alonsos Aston Martin into second In so doing he had threaded the needle in Monaco with an elegant but daredevil commitment that was at times almost heartstopping Nor was it predictable In those final moments of Q3 as the clock ticked down and the leading protagonists set about their final hot laps as the circuit reached its quickest it prompted almost a Mexican wave of celebrations in the pit lane Continue reading
Translated Text: Max Verstappen edges out Fernando Alonso to take Monaco F1 GP pole Charles Leclerc third but is given threeplace grid penaltyLewis Hamilton fifth after Mercedes step in right directionNothing if not spectacular qualifying for the Monaco Grand Prix is the session of the weekend that surely stirs the heart the most On the narrow twisting streets of Monte Carlo against the backdrop of the lowering cliffs of the principality and framed against the looming walls of the circuit the suddendeath drama the tense gripping draw of the single lap challenge is surely nowhere writ more large On Saturday Monaco delivered on all the promise with a truly stunning denouementIt was Max Verstappen who took pole for Red Bull but only with the most magnificent final sector of his final lap to pip Fernando Alonsos Aston Martin into second In so doing he had threaded the needle in Monaco with an elegant but daredevil commitment that was at times almost heartstopping Nor was it predictable In those final moments of Q3 as the clock ticked down and the leading protagonists set about their final hot laps as the circuit reached its quickest it prompted almost a Mexican wave of celebrations in the pit lane Continue reading

Original Text: Lutons giddy promotion fulfils long dream of returning to the elite One half of Wembley was a sea of orange as this 170m match showed it was about more than just money for both teamsTen minutes after Rob Edwards had been brought to a halt halfway around Wembley celebrating furiously a goal that was shortly disallowed the Luton manager was to be found victorious but calm as still water His first action on winning the playoff final was to hug his opponent Mark Robins Around this tender scene was pure chaos his players haring about embracing and hurling each other to the ground like so many 6fttall puppy dogs Promotion its a hell of a drugLuton Town are a Premier League club and international broadcast packages can now finally be cut probing the various tiny entrances to Kenilworth Road For the Hatters there is joy hope and  especially for the players  the chance to change their lives For Coventry whose disconsolate players stood motionless for 15 minutes after the end of a penalty shootout which featured 11 kicks scored and one ballooned horribly over the bar there will currently  but not permanently  be sorrow Continue reading
Translated Text: Lutons giddy promotion fulfils long dream of returning to the elite One half of Wembley was a sea of orange as this 170m match showed it was about more than just money for both teamsTen minutes after Rob Edwards had been brought to a halt halfway around Wembley celebrating furiously a goal that was shortly disallowed the Luton manager was to be found victorious but calm as still water His first action on winning the playoff final was to hug his opponent Mark Robins Around this tender scene was pure chaos his players haring about embracing and hurling each other to the ground like so many 6fttall puppy dogs Promotion its a hell of a drugLuton Town are a Premier League club and international broadcast packages can now finally be cut probing the various tiny entrances to Kenilworth Road For the Hatters there is joy hope and  especially for the players  the chance to change their lives For Coventry whose disconsolate players stood motionless for 15 minutes after the end of a penalty shootout which featured 11 kicks scored and one ballooned horribly over the bar there will currently  but not permanently  be sorrow Continue reading

Original Text: Rolling in the deep why tennis players are backing off against serve Retreating further and further behind the baseline to return serve on clay has become a notable trend in mens tennisAs Alejandro Davidovich Fokina took to the court last month to face his fellow Spaniard Albert Ramos Viñolas at the Madrid Open it soon became clear he had a slight problemBetween the lines modern courts measure the same but the distances beyond them vary dramatically The outside courts in Madrid had very little room behind the baseline and were narrow a problem for a player such as Davidovich Fokina who enjoys returning serve from deep on clay His attempts to return serve left the linesmen diving out of the way and led to numerous near misses with the back fence Continue reading
Translated Text: Rolling in the deep why tennis players are backing off against serve Retreating further and further behind the baseline to return serve on clay has become a notable trend in mens tennisAs Alejandro Davidovich Fokina took to the court last month to face his fellow Spaniard Albert Ramos Viñolas at the Madrid Open it soon became clear he had a slight problemBetween the lines modern courts measure the same but the distances beyond them vary dramatically The outside courts in Madrid had very little room behind the baseline and were narrow a problem for a player such as Davidovich Fokina who enjoys returning serve from deep on clay His attempts to return serve left the linesmen diving out of the way and led to numerous near misses with the back fence Continue reading

Original Text: James Milner Its only sad leaving if youve not achieved what you want After eight years and six major honours the former England midfielder says goodbye to Liverpool with fond memoriesJames Milner was given the news he had been long expecting three weeks ago Despite Jürgen Klopp wanting him to extend his eightyear stay no offer was forthcoming and he would be free to leave Liverpool at the end of his contractThe former England midfielder leaves with six major honours a plethora of memories and a better idea of the coach he wants to become when he eventually retires Others at 37 would be considering upgrading their golf clubs but Milner is determined to carry on even though he worries about the level of burnout in the modern game Milner will finish his Liverpool career on Sunday at Southampton and if rumours are to be believed will start next season along the south coast at Brighton Continue reading

Original Text: Luton promoted to Premier League after shootout victory against Coventry This time Rob Edwards really could celebrate The Luton manager had hared off down the touchline with four minutes of extra time remaining to celebrate what he thought was the winning goal in front of his sides supporters eating up 45 yards of Wembley turf only to retreat to his technical area ashenfaced after glancing up at the big screen confirming Joe Taylors extratime goal which would have been his first for the club had been disallowed for handball Jonathan Panzo on cold as a substitute dawdled on the ball and Taylor a 20yearold making his sixth appearance nicked it from the Coventry defender but surged through on goal with the help of his right handEdwards covered his face in disbelief but after 140 minutes of gripping action an agonising penalty shootout followed Eventually Fankaty Dabo missed the crucial spotkick as Luton clinched promotion to the Premier League at Coventrys expense capping an incredible rise from nonleague to the top flight in nine years Continue reading
Translated Text: Luton promoted to Premier League after shootout victory against Coventry This time Rob Edwards really could celebrate The Luton manager had hared off down the touchline with four minutes of extra time remaining to celebrate what he thought was the winning goal in front of his sides supporters eating up 45 yards of Wembley turf only to retreat to his technical area ashenfaced after glancing up at the big screen confirming Joe Taylors extratime goal which would have been his first for the club had been disallowed for handball Jonathan Panzo on cold as a substitute dawdled on the ball and Taylor a 20yearold making his sixth appearance nicked it from the Coventry defender but surged through on goal with the help of his right handEdwards covered his face in disbelief but after 140 minutes of gripping action an agonising penalty shootout followed Eventually Fankaty Dabo missed the crucial spotkick as Luton clinched promotion to the Premier League at Coventrys expense capping an incredible rise from nonleague to the top flight in nine years Continue reading

Original Text: Think clearly Smith seeks finalday survival hattrick with Leicester In 2011 and 2020 the manager beat the drop at Walsall and Aston Villa but his team require help on SundayBy a quirk of fate Dean Smith is in familiar territory Three years ago at an empty London Stadium because of the pandemic he preserved Aston Villas Premier League status on the final day of the season courtesy of a draw against David Moyess West Ham Moyes and West Ham again stand in the way of Smith securing safety and eerily Everton also host Bournemouth as they did at the climax of that strange seasonThis time however the scenario is much simpler  and there will be supporters to provide mood music Can you create scoreboard pressure on other teams I dont know the interim Leicester manager says We just have to concentrate on trying to win the game Continue reading
Translated Text: Think clearly Smith seeks finalday survival hattrick with Leicester In 2011 and 2020 the manager beat the drop at Walsall and Aston Villa but his team require help on SundayBy a quirk of fate Dean Smith is in familiar territory Three years ago at an empty London Stadium because of the pandemic he preserved Aston Villas Premier League status on the final day of the season courtesy of a draw against David Moyess West Ham Moyes and West Ham again stand in the way of Smith securing safety and eerily Everton also host Bournemouth as they did at the climax of that strange seasonThis time however the scenario is much simpler  and there will be supporters to provide mood music Can you create scoreboard pressure on other teams I dont know the interim Leicester manager says We just have to concentrate on trying to win the game Continue reading

Original Text: Allardyce hopes for Big Sam samba with Leeds in lastchance saloon Survival specialist has made career out of getting clubs out of trouble but he will need help to pull off his greatest escapeSam Allardyce had hoped history would repeat itself but so far at least it is refusing to comply In the spring of 2016 the interim Leeds manager was in charge at Sunderland and against all odds helped them avoid relegation courtesy partly of an inspired party trick After signing Jan Kirchhoff from Bayern Munich Allardyce immediately converted the Germany Under21 centrehalf into a central midfield anchorKirchhoff not only excelled but played a key role in Sunderlands survival so it did not come as a huge surprise when in the second game of his fourmatch contract at Leeds Allardyce relocated Robin Koch from defence to midfield Given Koch possesses eight Germany caps it initially seemed a case of deja vu but unfortunately for Leeds the centrehalf seems only an ersatz midfield enforcer Continue reading
Translated Text: Allardyce hopes for Big Sam samba with Leeds in lastchance saloon Survival specialist has made career out of getting clubs out of trouble but he will need help to pull off his greatest escapeSam Allardyce had hoped history would repeat itself but so far at least it is refusing to comply In the spring of 2016 the interim Leeds manager was in charge at Sunderland and against all odds helped them avoid relegation courtesy partly of an inspired party trick After signing Jan Kirchhoff from Bayern Munich Allardyce immediately converted the Germany Under21 centrehalf into a central midfield anchorKirchhoff not only excelled but played a key role in Sunderlands survival so it did not come as a huge surprise when in the second game of his fourmatch contract at Leeds Allardyce relocated Robin Koch from defence to midfield Given Koch possesses eight Germany caps it initially seemed a case of deja vu but unfortunately for Leeds the centrehalf seems only an ersatz midfield enforcer Continue reading

Original Text: I remember All the memes Guardiola never had doubts over Erling Haaland Norwegian striker has 36 Premier League goals in 35 gamesAfter one month he said Dont worry Ill score goalsPep Guardiola has revealed that Erling Haaland laughs at those with no respect for him and that the striker reassured his manager that goals would be scored despite seeing memes of the clear chance he missed in the Community ShieldCity lost 31 to Liverpool in Julys curtainraiser with Haaland drawing a blank and becoming the subject of memes because of an opportunity he blazed over the bar The Norwegian has 36 Premier League goals in 35 games and Guardiola was asked how he dealt with the pressure of his debut season in English football Continue reading

Original Text: McNeil channels Michael Jordan as Everton fight to save the last dance Winger prefers Jordans documentary to Leicesters nailbiting draw but is focused now Evertons destiny is in their own handsDwight McNeil preferred to watch The Last Dance rather than endure the stomachchurning tension of Leicesters draw with Newcastle on Monday Everton must hope the tale of a monumental lastgasp victory for Michael Jordan and the Chicago Bulls and not its title mirrors their SundayEverton last suffered the ignominy of relegation on 5 May 1951 Clement Attlee was prime minister Harry S Truman was US president and to stay up Cliff Brittons team needed a point away to a Sheffield Wednesday side who were in effect relegated Everton lost 60 finished bottom of the First Division and spent three seasons in the second before returning in 1954 remaining ever since Continue reading

Original Text: Belgium aid worker freed in prisoner swap with Iranian diplomat jailed for bomb plot Deal to release Olivier Vandecasteele in exchange for Assadollah Assadi raises concerns Tehrans hostage diplomacy has been rewardedA Belgian aid worker jailed in Tehran has been released in a prisoner swap with an Iranian diplomat who had been sentenced to 20 years in jail for his role in a plan to bomb an Iranian opposition rally in Paris in 2018Assadollah Assadi had served just over two years of his 20year sentence and his release will raise questions about whether Iranian hostage diplomacy  the practice of seizing dual nationals as bargaining chips  has been rewarded by the Belgian authorities The final stages of the deal were negotiated by Oman but Belgium had been negotiating with Iran over the fate of the diplomat for much longer Continue reading
Translated Text: Belgium aid worker freed in prisoner swap with Iranian diplomat jailed for bomb plot Deal to release Olivier Vandecasteele in exchange for Assadollah Assadi raises concerns Tehrans hostage diplomacy has been rewardedA Belgian aid worker jailed in Tehran has been released in a prisoner swap with an Iranian diplomat who had been sentenced to 20 years in jail for his role in a plan to bomb an Iranian opposition rally in Paris in 2018Assadollah Assadi had served just over two years of his 20year sentence and his release will raise questions about whether Iranian hostage diplomacy  the practice of seizing dual nationals as bargaining chips  has been rewarded by the Belgian authorities The final stages of the deal were negotiated by Oman but Belgium had been negotiating with Iran over the fate of the diplomat for much longer Continue reading

Original Text: Seven men charged with attempted murder of DCI John Caldwell Northern Ireland policeman was shot multiple times after a youth football team coaching session in FebruarySeven men have been charged with the attempted murder of a senior police detective in Northern Ireland police saidDCI John Caldwell was shot multiple times at a sports complex in Omagh County Tyrone after a youth football team coaching session on 22 February in an attack linked to dissident republicans His son was with him as he loaded footballs into the boot of his car when the gunmen approached Continue reading

Original Text: Australia news live Richard Marles bound for Pacific summit in South Korea Follow all the days newsGet our morning and afternoon news emails free app or daily news podcastHows your morning Graham Readfearn here starting the Guardians live news coverage for this Sunday 28 MayThe defence minister Richard Marles has announced overnight he is heading to South Korea for the inaugural KoreaPacific Islands summit that starts tomorrow A bit more about that shortlyA teenager is fighting for their life this morning after a car crash in Victorias west on Saturday that killed four peopleThe Victorian Nationals fell into line with federal counterparts and voted to oppose the Indigenous voice to parliament at the start of National Reconciliation WeekIndigenous Australians minister Linda Burney accused opposition leader Peter Dutton of playing politics with the Indigenous voice to parliament referendum and dividing AustraliansFormer NSW Liberal party president Maria Kovacic will replace the late senator for NSW Jim Molan after winning a preselection vote on SaturdayA third teenager came forward to assist police after a fire engulfed a sevenstorey building in Sydneys CBD on ThursdayCalls are growing for a parliamentary inquiry into use of force by NSW police with justice experts saying too much focus is placed on individual police officers rather than a festering systemic problemA government meetandgreet to connect Australian industry with the worlds largest oil company Saudi Aramco was criticised by environmental groups as akin to a joint trade show with a tobacco major Continue reading

Original Text: BillamSmith proves point in front of home fans to take Okolies title Bournemouth fighter becomes WBO cruiserweight championOkolie knocked down several times before losing on pointsChris BillamSmith is the new WBO cruiserweight world champion after defeating the previously unbeaten Lawrence Okolie who was knocked down three times and also docked two points for his ugly and excessive brawling Two of the judges had BillamSmith a comprehensive winner by margins of 116107 and 115108 while the third official bizarrely decided it was a 112112 draw It was a ridiculous score and the first two judges at least captured the mayhem of Okolies desperate tactics and the controlled discipline of BillamSmith who deserved all the plauditsA shuddering left hook from BillamSmith dropped Okolie in the fourth The champion lay on his right side looking stunned by the power of his former training partner Okolie held on but BillamSmith caught him with a right uppercut before the end of the round A nick over BillamSmiths right eye opened up but he looked supremely confident as he stalked Okolie in round five Okolie was reduced to yet more holding and the referee deducted a point midway through the round for his grappling Continue reading
Translated Text: BillamSmith proves point in front of home fans to take Okolies title Bournemouth fighter becomes WBO cruiserweight championOkolie knocked down several times before losing on pointsChris BillamSmith is the new WBO cruiserweight world champion after defeating the previously unbeaten Lawrence Okolie who was knocked down three times and also docked two points for his ugly and excessive brawling Two of the judges had BillamSmith a comprehensive winner by margins of 116107 and 115108 while the third official bizarrely decided it was a 112112 draw It was a ridiculous score and the first two judges at least captured the mayhem of Okolies desperate tactics and the controlled discipline of BillamSmith who deserved all the plauditsA shuddering left hook from BillamSmith dropped Okolie in the fourth The champion lay on his right side looking stunned by the power of his former training partner Okolie held on but BillamSmith caught him with a right uppercut before the end of the round A nick over BillamSmiths right eye opened up but he looked supremely confident as he stalked Okolie in round five Okolie was reduced to yet more holding and the referee deducted a point midway through the round for his grappling Continue reading

Original Text: Texas attorney general impeached by Republicanled House in historic vote Ken Paxton drew support from Donald Trump and Ted Cruz prior to the voteTexas Republicanled House of Representatives impeached state attorney general Ken Paxton on Saturday on articles including bribery and abuse of public trust a historic rebuke of a GOP official who rose to be a star of the conservative legal movement despite years of scandal and alleged crimesImpeachment triggers Paxtons immediate suspension from office pending the outcome of a trial in the state Senate and empowers Republican governor Greg Abbott to appoint someone else as Texas top lawyer in the interim Continue reading
Translated Text: Texas attorney general impeached by Republicanled House in historic vote Ken Paxton drew support from Donald Trump and Ted Cruz prior to the voteTexas Republicanled House of Representatives impeached state attorney general Ken Paxton on Saturday on articles including bribery and abuse of public trust a historic rebuke of a GOP official who rose to be a star of the conservative legal movement despite years of scandal and alleged crimesImpeachment triggers Paxtons immediate suspension from office pending the outcome of a trial in the state Senate and empowers Republican governor Greg Abbott to appoint someone else as Texas top lawyer in the interim Continue reading

Original Text: Rail strikes Hopes of a resolution have been indefinitely delayed After a year of walkouts and failed talks the unions ministers and operators are as far apart as everAlmost a year since the first national rail strike was called another series of stoppages loom Passengers who have been spared the usual round of disruptive bank holiday engineering works this weekend wont be so lucky in the second half of the halfterm break Strikes by drivers and crew will more or less wipe out services on Wednesday and Saturday shred schedules on Friday and add a bit of scattergun disruption in betweenThis time in 2022 the mere prospect of the biggest rail strike in decades was causing consternation Now though the latest guaranteed upheaval has not even produced a round of talks between unions and industry  let alone ministers  to try to head off the disruption Continue reading
Translated Text: Rail strikes Hopes of a resolution have been indefinitely delayed After a year of walkouts and failed talks the unions ministers and operators are as far apart as everAlmost a year since the first national rail strike was called another series of stoppages loom Passengers who have been spared the usual round of disruptive bank holiday engineering works this weekend wont be so lucky in the second half of the halfterm break Strikes by drivers and crew will more or less wipe out services on Wednesday and Saturday shred schedules on Friday and add a bit of scattergun disruption in betweenThis time in 2022 the mere prospect of the biggest rail strike in decades was causing consternation Now though the latest guaranteed upheaval has not even produced a round of talks between unions and industry  let alone ministers  to try to head off the disruption Continue reading

Original Text: Loper met hartaanval naar ziekenhuis overgebracht tijdens 20 km door Brussel Op een totaal van zon 40000 lopers en wandelaars die zondag aan de 20 kilometer door Brussel deelnamen hadden 579 deelnemers medische verzorging nodig Dat blijkt uit de voorlopige balans van het Rode Kruis Eén loper werd het slachtoffer van een hartaanval
Translated Text: Heart attack walker transferred to hospital during 20 km through Brussels On a total of 40000 runners and walkers who participated in the 20 kilometers through Brussels on Sunday, 579 participants needed medical care.

Original Text: Van we gaan zeker winnen tot hoe kon dit gebeuren reconstructie van de noodlottige dag voor Antwerp en zijn supporters Wat een nieuw hoogtepunt in de Antwerpse voetbalgeschiedenis moest worden is uitgedraaid op een sisser En dat voelden de supporters eens zo hard Op 90 minuten gingen ze van de hemel naar de hel
Translated Text: From we're sure to win to how could this happen reconstruction of the fateful day for Antwerp and its supporters What needed to be a new highlight in Antwerp's football history turned out to be a sisser And that was what the supporters once felt so hard At 90 minutes they went from heaven to hell

Original Text: Ze zou nooit meer kunnen sporten En toen ging Pascale 1000 dagen na elkaar lopen Duizend dagen na elkaar dagelijks gemiddeld 10km lopen zonder ook maar één uitzondering Die straffe running streak goed voor 10000km liep Pascale Cockhuyt bij elkaar Volgens de dokter zou ik nooit meer kunnen sporten Maar hij is heel blij dat hij ongelijk had
Translated Text: She could never exercise again And then Pascale walked 1,000 days in a row A thousand days in a row daily average walk 10km without one exception That punitive running streak good for 10000km ran Pascale Cockhuyt together According to the doctor I could never exercise again But he's very happy that he was wrong

Original Text: Nadir aarzelt niet als hij vrouw in de Maas ziet vallen en springt erachteraan Nadir twijfelde geen moment toen hij een oudere vrouw voor zijn neus in de Maas zag tuimelen De jongeman van Algerijnse afkomst sprong haar meteen achterna Hij hield de vrouw vast tot de brandweer arriveerde die beide slachtoffers uit het water kon halen
Translated Text: Nadir does not hesitate when he sees woman fall into the Meuse and jumps after Nadir did not hesitate for a moment when he saw an older woman tumble in front of him in the Meuse The young man of Algerian descent jumped right after her He held the woman until the firefighter arrived who could pull both victims out of the water

Original Text: Fietsers en buurtbewoners hekelen verkeerssituatie na dodelijk ongeval Een mirakel dat dit niet eerder gebeurde Is de fietssuggestiestrook op de Vrijheid in Hoogstraten waar zaterdag een 62jarige fietsster om het leven kwam te gevaarlijk En wat kan er dan beter De reacties van fietsers en buurtbewoners tijdens het Pinksterweekend zijn alvast unaniem Ze spreken over te hoge snelheden en te veel grote tractoren Ik kom hier absoluut niet voor mijn plezier
Translated Text: Cyclists and neighborhood residents denounce traffic situation after fatal accident A miracle that didn't happen before Is the bike suggestion strip on the Freedom in Hoogstraten where Saturday a 62-year-old cyclist died too dangerous And what could be better The reactions of cyclists and neighborhood residents during the Pentecost weekend are already unanimous They talk about too high speeds and too many large tractors I come here absolutely not for my pleasure

Original Text: Premier De Croo over ruildeal Vandecasteele Iran had niet veel geduld meer De toestand van Olivier Vandecasteele was na 455 dagen onmenselijke opsluiting echt moeilijk en we wisten dat er niet veel geduld meer was aan de andere kant verklaarde premier Alexander De Croo zondag op RTLTVi de keuze van de regering om beroep te doen op artikel 167 van de Grondwet in plaats van de procedure van het uitleveringsverdrag voor de bevrijding van de Belgische ngomedewerker
Translated Text: Prime Minister De Croo on exchange deal Vandecasteele Iran had little patience The situation of Olivier Vandecasteele after 455 days inhumane imprisonment was really difficult and we knew that there wasn't much patience on the other hand Prime Minister Alexander De Croo on Sunday at RTLTVi declared the government's choice to invoke Article 167 of the Constitution instead of the extradition treaty procedure for the liberation of the Belgian NGO employee

Original Text: Na vrijlating Olivier Vandecasteele ook ouders van opgesloten Belg Tanguy Taller schreeuwen om hulp Na de inspanningen die de regering deed om de Belg Olivier Vandecasteele vrij te krijgen uit een cel in Iran met succes vragen ook de ouders van Tanguy Taller uit Brugge die al vier jaar opgesloten zit in een cel in Cambodja om hulp Taller werd tot levenslang veroordeeld voor drugssmokkel maar volgens zijn ouders is hij onschuldig
Translated Text: After the release of Olivier Vandecasteele also parents of imprisoned Belgian Tanguy Taller cry out for help After the efforts made by the government to get the Belgian Olivier Vandecasteele out of a cell in Iran successfully asked the parents of Tanguy Taller from Bruges who has been locked up in a cell in Cambodia for help Taller was sentenced to life imprisonment for drug smuggling but according to his parents he is innocent

Original Text: Eerste reactie van Olivier Vandecasteele na zijn terugkeer Ontdekken dat zoveel mensen me 15 maanden lang hebben gesteund heeft me tot tranen toe bewogen De bevrijde NGOmedewerker Olivier Vandecasteele had zondagmorgen een persoonlijke boodschap voor de tientallen mensen die voor hem kwamen lopen op de loopwedstrijd 20km door Brussel Ik heb ontdekt dat zoveel mensen me gesteund hebben Dat heeft me tot tranen toe bewogen
Translated Text: First reaction of Olivier Vandecasteele after his return Discovering that so many people have supported me for 15 months The liberated NGO employee Olivier Vandecasteele had a personal message for the dozens of people who came for him on the 20km race through Brussels Sunday morning I discovered that so many people have supported me That has moved me to tears

Original Text: Vader 39 van jonge kinderen loopt brandwonden op na steekvlam door PUR gezin brengt elders nacht door Een 39jarige vader uit Houthulst liep zaterdagavond brandwonden op na een brand in zijn woning Er ontstond bij werken plots een steekvlam Daarop volgde een brand in het huis maar die was snel onder controle Omdat er te veel rook in het huis hing moest het gezin elders slapen zegt brandweerkapitein Gino Crombez
Translated Text: Father 39 of young children burns after fire by PUR family spends night elsewhere A 39-year-old father from Houthulst got burns Saturday night after a fire in his home When he worked, suddenly a sting flame followed a fire in the house but he was quickly under control Because there was too much smoke in the house the family had to sleep elsewhere says fire captain Gino Crombez

Original Text: CDV komt met aangepast voorstel voor nationaal toegangsverbod recreatiedomeinen CDV dient een nieuw voorstel in om mensen over het hele land de toegang tot recreatiedomeinen te kunnen ontzeggen Vorig jaar werd dat al eens geprobeerd maar die basis bleek juridisch te zwak Tegenwoordig nemen meer en meer recreatiedomeinen zelf het initiatief om zwarte lijsten aan te leggen maar zij kunnen die gegevens momenteel nog niet met elkaar delen
Translated Text: CDV comes up with amended proposal for national ban on access to recreational domains CDV presents a new proposal to deny people access to recreational domains throughout the country Last year that was already tried but that basis turned out to be legally weak Today more and more recreational domains themselves take the initiative to create blacklists but they cannot yet share that data with each other

Original Text: Man 50 komt om bij woningbrand in buurt van Aat In een villa in de buurt van de Henegouwse stad Aat is in de nacht van zaterdag op zondag brand uitgebroken Een van de bewoners een 50jarige man is omgekomen in de vlammen Dat heeft de brandweer zondag gemeld

Original Text: Motorrijder overleden na aanrijding met bus in Luik Een 49jarige motorrijder die zaterdag tegen een bus was gebotst in de Luikse deelgemeente Bressoux is in de loop van de nacht aan zijn verwondingen overleden Dat heeft het parket van Luik zondag bekendgemaakt
Translated Text: Motorcyclist died after hit by bus in Liège A 49-year-old motorcyclist who crashed into a bus on Saturday in the Liège district of Bressoux died of his injuries during the night.

Original Text: Jan Jambon over kinderopvang Het is een prioritair dossier dat op tafel komt bij begrotingsopmaak Kinderopvang is een prioritair dossier en zal bij de begrotingsbesprekingen op de tafel liggen Dat zei Vlaams ministerpresident Jan Jambon NVA zondagmiddag bij VTM Nieuws waar hij CDVvoorzitter Sammy Mahdi opriep om zijn oekazes achterwege te laten omdat die volgens hem niet tot een oplossing leiden

Original Text: Auto vliegt uit de bocht in provincie Luxemburg bestuurder in levensgevaar Bij een ongeval op de N83 in Muno tussen Florenville en Bouillon in de provincie Luxemburg is in de nacht van zaterdag op zondag een automobilist levensgevaarlijk gewond geraakt Dat bevestigt het parket
Translated Text: Car flies off the bend in Luxembourg province driver in danger of death In an accident on the N83 in Muno between Florenville and Bouillon in the province of Luxembourg, a motorist was injured in mortal danger on the night of Saturday on Sunday.

Original Text: Eeuwenlang verdwenen schat uit Chinese Mingdynastie ontdekt waarde 4 miljoen euro per stuk Zon anderhalve kilometer onder de zeespiegel is in de ZuidChinese Zee een eeuwenoude schat gevonden Volgens experten dateert de schat uit de Zhengdeperiode 15061521 ten tijde van de Mingdynastie Videobeelden tonen dat er op de zeebodem veel porseleinwerk in alle vormen en kleuren te vinden was met een waarde van zon 4 miljoen euro per stuk
Translated Text: Centuries of lost treasure from Chinese Ming Dynasty discovered value 4 million euros each Sun and a half kilometers below sea level has been found in the South China Sea a centuries-old treasure According to experts the treasure dates from the Zhengde period 15061521 at the time of the Ming Dynasty Video images show that there was a lot of porcelain work in all shapes and colors with a value of sun 4 million euros each

Translated Text: Three deaths in motorbike gang shootings in the U.S. During a motorbike shootings in the U.S. state of New Mexico, at least three people were killed on Saturday night. Five people were also injured. Authorities confirmed reports from local media. According to the mayor of Red River, it was an incident between motorcycle gangs.

Translated Text: Biden has agreed to increase debt ceiling with Republicans US President Joe Biden and Republican leader Kevin McCarthy have reached a principle agreement on raising the debt ceiling on Saturday a few days before the deadline expires.

Original Text: Dag van de waarheid in Turkije verzilvert Erdogan zege of is er toch hoop voor oppositie tijdens tweede ronde verkiezingen Vandaag op 28 mei trekken de Turken opnieuw naar de stembusgang voor een tweede ongeziene ronde van de presidentsverkiezingen In de eerste ronde haalde zittend president Recep Tayyip Erdogan nipt geen meerderheid Hij hoopt dan ook nog enkele jaren aan zijn twintig jaar durende heerschappij te breien Uitdager Kemal Kiliçdaroglu zet alles op alles om daar een stokje voor te steken

Original Text: Biden heeft akkoord met Republikeinen op zak over verhoging schuldenplafond De Amerikaanse president Joe Biden en de Republikeinse leider Kevin McCarthy hebben zaterdag enkele dagen voor het aflopen van de deadline een principeakkoord bereikt over de verhoging van het schuldenplafond De twee politieke leiders probeerden al enige tijd om een compromis te vinden en er zo voor te zorgen dat de Verenigde Staten hun facturen kunnen blijven betalen
Translated Text: Biden has agreed to raise debt ceiling with Republicans on Saturday, a few days before the end of the deadline, US President Joe Biden and Republican leader Kevin McCarthy reached an agreement in principle on raising the debt ceiling The two political leaders have been trying for some time to find a compromise so that the United States can continue to pay their bills.

Original Text: China deelt beelden van albinoreuzenpanda Enige in zijn soort Het Chinese staatspersbureau deelde zaterdag beelden van de bijzonderste reuzenpanda in het Wolong National Nature Reserve Op de beelden die dateren uit februari is een volledig witte panda te zien Het is tot zo ver wij weten de enige albinopanda ter wereld zegt He Tingmei adjunctdirecteur van het natuurreservaat
Translated Text: China shares images of albinorousenpanda Only of its kind The Chinese state press agency shared Saturday images of the most extraordinary giant panda in the Wolong National Nature Reserve On the images dating from February is a completely white panda seen It is so far as we know the only albinopanda in the world says He Tingmei Deputy Director of the Nature Reserve

Original Text: Eerste grote Chinese passagiersvliegtuig maakt commerciële maidenvlucht Het eerste door China zelf ontwikkelde grote passagiersvliegtuig de C919 heeft zondag zijn commerciële maidenvlucht gemaakt Dat hebben Chinese staatsmedia gemeld

Original Text: Bestuurder wil overstromende straat oversteken maar ontdekt al snel dat dat een dom idee was Een kapper uit het Spaanse Murcia heeft donderdag naar eigen zeggen het domste ooit gefilmd De stad kampt met overstromingen nadat er dagenlang veel regen viel Toen de man naar huis aan het wandelen was zag hij enkele bestuurders staan die geen kant meer op konden door de regen Maar één van hen wilde tóch de straat oversteken Ik vroeg hem of hij gek was geworden De bestuurder had er echter geen oren naar en probeerde door te rijden maar dat was geen goed idee De wagen werd meegesleurd door de stroming Wat had hij nou gedacht klonk het achteraf Hoe de bestuurder er vanaf is gekomen is niet geweten
Translated Text: Driver wants to cross flooded street but soon discovers that that was a stupid idea A barber from Spanish Murcia has filmed Thursday the dumbest ever The city is covered with floods after a lot of rain for days When the man was walking home he saw some drivers who couldn't move through the rain But one of them wanted to cross the street I asked him if he had gone mad However, the driver had no ears to and tried to drive but that was not a good idea The car was dragged away by the current What he had imagined sounded afterwards How the driver got off was not known

Original Text: Eeuwenlange verdwenen schat uit Chinese Mingdynastie ontdekt waarde 4 miljoen euro per stuk Zon anderhalve kilometer onder de zeespiegel is in de ZuidChinese Zee een eeuwenoude schat gevonden Volgens experten dateert de schat uit de Zhengdeperiode 15061521 ten tijde van de Mingdynastie Videobeelden tonen dat er op de zeebodem veel porseleinwerk in alle vormen en kleuren te vinden was met een waarde van zon 4 miljoen euro per stuk
Translated Text: Centuries of lost treasure from Chinese Ming Dynasty discovered value 4 million euros each Sun and a half kilometers below sea level has been found in the South China Sea a centuries-old treasure According to experts the treasure dates from the Zhengde period 15061521 at the time of the Ming Dynasty Video images show that there was a lot of porcelain work in all shapes and colours with a value of sun 4 million euros each

Original Text: Verjaardag Oekraïense hoofdstad start in mineur dodelijk slachtoffer na massale droneaanval op Kyiv De Oekraïense hoofdstad Kyiv kwam in de nacht van zaterdag op zondag opnieuw onder vuur te liggen door een massale aanval met Russische drones zo heeft de burgemeester van Kyiv Vitali Klitsjko gezegd Daarbij vielen volgens hem een dode en drie gewonden De stad viert zondag zijn verjaardag

Original Text: Dag van de waarheid in Turkije verzilvert Erdogan zege of is er toch hoop voor oppositie Vandaag op 28 mei trekken de Turken opnieuw naar de stembusgang voor een tweede ongeziene ronde van de presidentsverkiezingen In de eerste ronde haalde zittend president Recep Tayyip Erdogan nipt geen meerderheid Hij hoopt dan ook nog enkele jaren aan zijn twintig jaar durende heerschappij te breien Uitdager Kemal Kiliçdaroglu zet alles op alles om daar een stokje voor te steken
Translated Text: Day of Truth in Turkey Erdogan wins or is there hope for opposition Today on 28 May the Turks again go to the ballot box for a second unseen round of the presidential elections In the first round, sitting President Recep Tayyip Erdogan nicks no majority He hopes to knit his twenty-year reign Challenger Kemal Kiliçdaroglu makes every effort to stop it.

Original Text: Ondanks anticlimax vergeten Antwerpfans Faris Haroun niet met prachtige tifo Capi voor het leven Faris Haroun neemt na dit seizoen afscheid van het profvoetbal als speler De fans van Antwerp hadden voor hun kapitein een tifo in petto waarmee ze Haroun voor de wedstrijd tegen Union al bedanken voor de jarenlange inzet voor de club Capi voor het leven stond er te lezen Na de wedstrijd volgde nog een emotioneel moment tussen speler en supporters Na dit seizoen blijft hij wel actief binnen de club
Translated Text: Despite anticlimax, Antwerp fans don't forget Faris Haroun with beautiful tipo Capi for life Faris Haroun says goodbye to professional football after this season as a player The fans of Antwerp had a tipo in store for their captain with which they already thank Haroun for the game against Union for the years of commitment to the Capi club for life.After the game followed an emotional moment between player and supporters After this season he remains active within the club.

Original Text: IN BEELD Vandaag tien jaar geleden trokken duizend Antwerpsupporters naar stadhuis voor voortbestaan van hun club Het is exact tien jaar geleden van 28 mei 2013 dat Antwerp een ander historisch moment meemaakte Duizend supporters trokken in een Mars van de Schande naar de Antwerpse Grote Markt terwijl daar binnen de gemeenteraad vergaderde Inzet een heel nieuwe club op basis van een bestaand stamnummer en een nieuw stadion De Antwerpaanhang wilde dat met alle middelen tegenhouden
Translated Text: IN IMAGE Today ten years ago, thousands of Antwerp supporters went to town hall for the survival of their club It's exactly ten years ago from 28 May 2013 that Antwerp experienced another historic moment A thousand supporters marched in a Mars from the Scandal to the Antwerp Grand Place while within the city council Bet met a whole new club based on an existing tribal number and a new stadium De Antwerpanhang wanted to stop it by all means.

Translated Text: Russia launches biggest drone attack yet on Kyiv as city marks its founding Ukraine says it shot down 52 Iranianmade devices but debris killed one person and injured twoRussiaUkraine war  latest coverageRussia unleashed the biggest drone attack against Kyiv of the war so far overnight as the city prepared to mark the annual celebration of its founding However according to Ukrainian military officials almost all the Iranianmade aircraft were shot downThe air force said it shot down 52 out of 54 Shahed drones launched against the city in successive waves but falling debris still killed one man injured two people and set ablaze the roof of a shopping centre Continue reading

Original Text: US ready to fight in space if we have to says military official Threat posed by provocative Russia and China has left US no choice but to prepare for orbital skirmishesThe US is ready for conflict in outer space according to a senior military official after developing antisatellite technologies to counter the threats posed by provocative countries such as Russia and ChinaBrig Gen Jesse Morehouse at US Space Command the arm of the military responsible for space operations said Russian aggression and Chinas vision to become the dominant space power by midcentury had left the US with no choice but to prepare for orbital skirmishes Continue reading
Translated Text: US ready to fight in space if we have to says military official Threat posed by provocative Russia and China has left US no choice but to prepare for orbital skirmishesThe US is ready for conflict in outer space according to a senior military official after developing antisatellite technologies to counter the threats posed by provocative countries such as Russia and ChinaBrig Gen Jesse Morehouse at US Space Command the arm of the military responsible for space operations said Russian aggression and Chinas vision to become the dominant space power by midcentury had left the US with no choice but to prepare for orbital skirmishes Continue reading

Original Text: RussiaUkraine war at a glance what we know on day 459 of the invasion Man killed in Kyiv as Russia launches large drone attack Russian ambassador to UK says Moscow has yet to act very seriouslySee all our RussiaUkraine war coverageExplosions shook the Ukrainian capital in the early hours of Sunday A 41yearold man was killed by falling debris of Russian drones being shot out of the air as the Kremlin launched a 54strong drone attack on KyivThe death was confirmed by Kyivs mayor Vitali Klitschko who said a 35yearold woman was also injured by the fall of the drones wreckage in the Solomianskyi districtUkraines air force said it downed 52 of the 54 drones during the attack which it said was a record attack by the Iranianmade ShahedsThe Russian ambassador to the UK Andrei Kelin told the UKs BBC that Russia had enormous resources and we havent just started yet to act very seriouslyIn an interview with Laura Kuenssberg he repeated Russias line that the jailed Wall Street Journal reporter Evan Gershkovich was a spy In response to a question by Vladimir KaraMurzas wife he said it was a decision of the courts rather than governmentled oppression that led to KaraMurzas 25year jail termThe death toll from a Russian missile attack on a clinic in Dnipro on Friday rose from two to four people according to the regions governorSouth Africas president Cyril Ramaphosa appointed a panel to investigate US allegations that a Russian ship collected weapons from a naval base near Cape Town last year the presidency said in a statement on SundayUkraines president Volodymyr Zelenskiy asked Ukraines parliament to approve 50yearlong sanctions against Iran because of Tehrans role in supplying Russia with drones and military equipment for the warPreliminary operations have begun to pave the way for a counteroffensive against Russian occupying forces a Ukrainian presidential adviser said Its a complicated process which is not a matter of one day or a certain date or a certain hour Mykhailo Podolyak said in an interview with the Guardian Its an ongoing process of deoccupation and certain processes are already happening like destroying supply lines or blowing up depots behind the linesThe commander of Ukraines armed forces Gen Valerii Zaluzhnyi raised expectations that a major operation could be imminent declaring on social media The time has come to take back whats ours Zaluzhnyis declaration on the Telegram messaging app on Saturday was accompanied by a cinematic video showing heavily armed Ukrainian soldiers preparing for battle Continue reading

Original Text: Sure Start director says childcare reform is for UK economy not children Naomi Eisenstadt first programme lead says there is lack of attention on what childcare is actually forNaomi Eisenstadt remembers her excitement as she started as the first director of the governments Sure Start unit in 1999I felt like Lyndon Johnson had run up and asked me to set up Head Start she says referring to the US presidents key 1965 policy to fight the war on poverty Continue reading

Original Text: Fiveyearold girl dies after house fire in southwest Wales Alysia Salisbury was described as a beautiful daughter and sister in a tribute from her familyA fiveyearold girl has died after a house fire in Pembrokeshire southwest WalesAlysia Salisbury was described as a beautiful daughter and sister in a tribute from her family released through Dyfed Powys police Continue reading

Original Text: Biden and McCarthy reach in principle deal to raise debt ceiling days before US default Agreement will reportedly raise debt limit for two years but deal still needs approval from a divided US congressLawmakers in Washington were busily drafting legislation on Sunday after Joe Biden and the House Republican speaker Kevin McCarthy reached a deal in principle on Saturday night to raise the federal governments 314tn debt ceiling with just days left before America was expected to defaultThere was a slim chance that a bill could be finalized as early as Sunday and be presented on Capitol Hill where it is expected to have a stormy passage in a divided Congress Continue reading
Translated Text: Biden and McCarthy reach in principle deal to raise debt ceiling days before US default Agreement will reportedly raise debt limit for two years but deal still needs approval from a divided US congressLawmakers in Washington were busily drafting legislation on Sunday after Joe Biden and the House Republican speaker Kevin McCarthy reached a deal in principle on Saturday night to raise the federal governments 314tn debt ceiling with just days left before America was expected to defaultThere was a slim chance that a bill could be finalized as early as Sunday and be presented on Capitol Hill where it is expected to have a stormy passage in a divided Congress Continue reading

Original Text: It would be a betrayal to back down now university pay row reaches new level of acrimony As the stalemate continues union infighting has added a new dimension while universities are threatening to dock payWhen Jo Grady general secretary of the University and College Union UCU stood at the podium of its annual congress yesterday she said she had never been so proud to be part of this union as I have in recent weeks watching you all stand firm in the face of vindictive bullying behaviour from employersOur wins this year have been achieved through unity she told the assembled lecturers Facing the fights ahead lets focus our energy on the real enemy the employers Continue reading
Translated Text: It would be a betrayal to back down now university pay row reaches new level of acrimony As the stalemate continues union infighting has added a new dimension while universities are threatening to dock payWhen Jo Grady general secretary of the University and College Union UCU stood at the podium of its annual congress yesterday she said she had never been so proud to be part of this union as I have in recent weeks watching you all stand firm in the face of vindictive bullying behaviour from employersOur wins this year have been achieved through unity she told the assembled lecturers Facing the fights ahead lets focus our energy on the real enemy the employers Continue reading

Original Text: Ebike chargers posing fire risk found on eBay Amazon and Wishcom Exclusive More than a dozen potentially dangerous devices on sale despite rise in fatal firesEbike chargers that pose a risk of fire and electric shock have been found on sale on Amazon eBay and Wishcom amid a sharp rise in blazes associated with batterypowered bicycles and scootersMore than a dozen lowcost devices several with substandard unfused plugs were on offer on all three websites a Guardian investigation with the charity Electrical Safety First ESF found Continue reading

Original Text: Two men die after being pulled from sea off Devon coast Rescue operation off Torbay recovered two men in their 20s and one was declared dead at the sceneTwo men in their 20s have died after being pulled from the sea off the coast of Torbay Devon and Cornwall police saidOfficers were called to assist the coastguard at about 9am on Saturday after reports of concern for two people off Oddicombe beach Continue reading

Original Text: UK records hottest day of year as temperatures hit 243C High recorded in Bramham in West Yorkshire on Saturday as motorists warned to prepare for busy roadsThe UK experienced the hottest day of the year so far on Saturday as motorists were urged to prepare for the busiest late May bank holiday since before the pandemicThe Met Office said temperatures climbed to 243C 757F at Bramham West Yorkshire on Saturday afternoon Continue reading
Translated Text: UK records hottest day of year as temperatures hit 243C High recorded in Bramham in West Yorkshire on Saturday as motorists warned to prepare for busy roadsThe UK experienced the hottest day of the year so far on Saturday as motorists were urged to prepare for the busiest late May bank holiday since before the pandemicThe Met Office said temperatures climbed to 243C 757F at Bramham West Yorkshire on Saturday afternoon Continue reading

Original Text: Details of US debt ceiling deal being ironed out to avert catastrophic default Biden calls tentative agreement an important step forward but deal still needs to receive approval from a divided CongressLegislation was being urgently worked on in Washington on Sunday to spell out the details of the tentative deal to raise the US debt ceiling struck between President Joe Biden and House speaker Kevin McCarthy hours earlier with the aim of putting it before Congress and avoiding a catastrophic and unprecedented default in early JuneMembers of Congress expect to be shown the details of the deal later on Sunday and McCarthy wants the forthcoming bill to be voted on in the House on Wednesday he indicated in a press conference on Capitol Hill on Sunday midmorning noting that negotiators had been up all night Continue reading
Translated Text: Details of US debt ceiling deal being ironed out to avert catastrophic default Biden calls tentative agreement an important step forward but deal still needs to receive approval from a divided CongressLegislation was being urgently worked on in Washington on Sunday to spell out the details of the tentative deal to raise the US debt ceiling struck between President Joe Biden and House speaker Kevin McCarthy hours earlier with the aim of putting it before Congress and avoiding a catastrophic and unprecedented default in early JuneMembers of Congress expect to be shown the details of the deal later on Sunday and McCarthy wants the forthcoming bill to be voted on in the House on Wednesday he indicated in a press conference on Capitol Hill on Sunday midmorning noting that negotiators had been up all night Continue reading

Original Text: Three people killed and five injured in shooting at New Mexico biker rally Mayor of Red River says the shooting was gangrelated and that the shooters have all been taken into custodyThree people were killed and five injured in a shooting at a biker rally in Red River New Mexico on SaturdayNeither the victims nor the shooters were local residents and were among bikers who were visiting for the rally over the long weekend holiday leading into Memorial Day Red River mayor Linda Calhoun told the Guardian on Sunday Continue reading

Original Text: Experts warn of increased risk of US terror attacks by rightwing lone wolf actors Individuals rather than organized groups more likely to commit extremist crimes as inflammatory Republican rhetoric escalatesThe US is at an increased risk of domestic terror attacks by rightwing lone wolf actors experts have warned as inflammatory Republican rhetoric around a variety of issues seems likely to continue ahead of the 2024 electionThe number of attacks by adherents to rightwing ideology has soared since 2016 as Republican lies about election interference and escalating rhetoric from the right about minority groups have served to provide mechanisms for individuals to become radicalized an analyst said Continue reading
Translated Text: Experts warn of increased risk of US terror attacks by rightwing lone wolf actors Individuals rather than organized groups more likely to commit extremist crimes as inflammatory Republican rhetoric escalatesThe US is at an increased risk of domestic terror attacks by rightwing lone wolf actors experts have warned as inflammatory Republican rhetoric around a variety of issues seems likely to continue ahead of the 2024 electionThe number of attacks by adherents to rightwing ideology has soared since 2016 as Republican lies about election interference and escalating rhetoric from the right about minority groups have served to provide mechanisms for individuals to become radicalized an analyst said Continue reading

Original Text: DeSantis accused of catastrophic climate approach after campaign launch Republican trying to outTrump Trump on climate expert says as governor says he rejects the politicization of the weatherRon DeSantis has been accused of a catastrophic approach to the climate crisis after he launched his campaign for US president by saying he rejects the politicization of the weather and questioning whether hurricanes hitting his home state of Florida have been worsened by climate changeDeSantis the Republican Florida governor who announced his bid for the White House via a glitchheavy Twitter stream on Wednesday has previously dismissed concerns about global heating as leftwing stuff and he expanded upon this theme during a Fox News interview following his campaign launch Continue reading
