Original Text: Lactivité physique permettrait de limiter le risque de Parkinson Des chercheurs français ont montré que les femmes les plus sportives avaient jusquà 25 de risque en moins de développer la pathologie neurodégénérative
Translated Text: Physical activity would reduce Parkinson's risk French researchers have shown that the most athletic women have up to 25 less risk of developing neurodegenerative pathology

Original Text: Disbelief hangs in air as Leicester sleepwalk to avoidable relegation  Barney Ronay No team with talented players such as James Maddison Harvey Barnes and Youri Tielemans should be this badAs the clock ticked past 80 minutes at the King Power Stadium with Leicester beating West Ham but hostage entirely to events at Goodison Park it felt fitting that this should be one of those relegations sung to its rest by ghosts of other games of goals unscored energy waves rumours the Mexican wave of deathSeveral times through those final 10 minutes the ground was gripped by sudden contortions of false joy leaping roaring sections of crowd lifted by news of fake survival realitylag nonredemption If Bournemouth score a nongoal and nobody tells the King Power it doesnt exist is that nongoal still a goal And who does Youri Tielemans sign for next season Continue reading

Original Text: Everton seal Premier League survival as Doucouré screamer sinks Bournemouth Everton extended Abdoulaye Doucourés contract on Wednesday and the midfielder repaid them by extending their residence in the top flight of English football into a 70th year On a day of exhausting emotion at Goodison Park  a horrible day Sean Dyche admitted  the midfielder struck a superb critical winner against Bournemouth to ensure Everton avoided a first relegation since 1951There was a nerveracking finish where 10 minutes of added time an injury to Jordan Pickfords hand and the determination of Gary ONeils team to prove they were not on the beach made Everton fight to the last for their Premier League status Continue reading
Translated Text: Everton seal Premier League survival as Doucouré screamer sinks Bournemouth Everton extended Abdoulaye Doucourés contract on Wednesday and the midfielder repaid them by extending their residence in the top flight of English football into a 70th year On a day of exhausting emotion at Goodison Park  a horrible day Sean Dyche admitted  the midfielder struck a superb critical winner against Bournemouth to ensure Everton avoided a first relegation since 1951There was a nerveracking finish where 10 minutes of added time an injury to Jordan Pickfords hand and the determination of Gary ONeils team to prove they were not on the beach made Everton fight to the last for their Premier League status Continue reading

Original Text: Mark Cavendish wins final stage of Giro dItalia as Roglic takes overall victory Geraint Thomas finishes second to Primoz Roglic in standingsCavendish wins sprint in final Giro stage before retirementMark Cavendish brought the curtain down on his final Giro dItalia with a spectacular stage win in Rome as Primoz Roglic sealed his first overall victory in the raceCavendish who announced last week that he will retire at the end of this season easily outsprinted his rivals to take his 17th stage win in the Giro Continue reading
Translated Text: Mark Cavendish wins final stage of Giro dItalia as Roglic takes overall victory Geraint Thomas finishes second to Primoz Roglic in standingsCavendish wins sprint in final Giro stage before retirementMark Cavendish brought the curtain down on his final Giro dItalia with a spectacular stage win in Rome as Primoz Roglic sealed his first overall victory in the raceCavendish who announced last week that he will retire at the end of this season easily outsprinted his rivals to take his 17th stage win in the Giro Continue reading

Original Text: Sam Allardyce open to Leeds stay but warns side may struggle in second tier Work to be done claims Allardyce after relegation is confirmedDean Smith unlikely to stay at Leicester after failing to beat dropSam Allardyce has warned that Leeds could struggle in the Championship after his fourgame interim tenure ended with relegation After the 41 defeat by Tottenham at Elland Road  where two goals from Harry Kane lifted the strikers Premier League tally to 30 for the season  Allardyce had a stark unvarnished message for the Leeds boardThere is a lot of work to be done here next season even in the Championship said the 68yearold who is open to remaining in charge Goals need to be scored and you need goalscorers to score them The squad is a little on the young side and lacks experience As a squad they havent been good enough You cant keep making unforced errors We gifted Tottenham three goals today Which way does the club want to go Continue reading
Translated Text: Sam Allardyce open to Leeds stay but warns side may struggle in second tier Work to be done claims Allardyce after relegation is confirmedDean Smith unlikely to stay at Leicester after failing to beat dropSam Allardyce has warned that Leeds could struggle in the Championship after his fourgame interim tenure ended with relegation After the 41 defeat by Tottenham at Elland Road  where two goals from Harry Kane lifted the strikers Premier League tally to 30 for the season  Allardyce had a stark unvarnished message for the Leeds boardThere is a lot of work to be done here next season even in the Championship said the 68yearold who is open to remaining in charge Goals need to be scored and you need goalscorers to score them The squad is a little on the young side and lacks experience As a squad they havent been good enough You cant keep making unforced errors We gifted Tottenham three goals today Which way does the club want to go Continue reading

Original Text: Max Verstappen wins wet Monaco F1 GP to stretch world championship lead Fernando Alonso second Esteban Ocon completes podiumVerstappen leads Sergio Pérez by 39 points in driver standingsIt seems little is going to prove a distraction to Max Verstappen on what appears to be an increasingly inexorable march to his third Formula One championship Certainly the inconvenience of heavy rain at the Monaco Grand Prix only brought out the best in the world champion as he dominated once more on the streets of Monte Carlo to win a race saved from the usual tiresome procession by welcome late drama when the heavens openedAfter what had been a gripping qualifying on Saturday a fearsome thrilling suddendeath shootout that was impossible to ignore the race for a large part of the afternoon had every indication of delivering the usual lineastern anticlimax on the streets of the principality F1s longacclaimed jewel in the crown once more revealed to be a dusty flawed shabby piece of paste changing hands in the back room of a pub When the rain came however the jeopardy the drama was once more all too real and the fearsome challenge riveting Continue reading
Translated Text: Max Verstappen wins wet Monaco F1 GP to stretch world championship lead Fernando Alonso second Esteban Ocon completes podiumVerstappen leads Sergio Pérez by 39 points in driver standingsIt seems little is going to prove a distraction to Max Verstappen on what appears to be an increasingly inexorable march to his third Formula One championship Certainly the inconvenience of heavy rain at the Monaco Grand Prix only brought out the best in the world champion as he dominated once more on the streets of Monte Carlo to win a race saved from the usual tiresome procession by welcome late drama when the heavens openedAfter what had been a gripping qualifying on Saturday a fearsome thrilling suddendeath shootout that was impossible to ignore the race for a large part of the afternoon had every indication of delivering the usual lineastern anticlimax on the streets of the principality F1s longacclaimed jewel in the crown once more revealed to be a dusty flawed shabby piece of paste changing hands in the back room of a pub When the rain came however the jeopardy the drama was once more all too real and the fearsome challenge riveting Continue reading

Original Text: JohnsonThompson can see a path back after secondplace finish in Götzis Briton second to Anna Hall at prestigious HypomeetingJohnsonThompson I have blown the cobwebs offKatarina JohnsonThompson believes she has rediscovered her mojo after an impressive secondplaced finish at the prestigious Hypomeeting in Götzis  and insists she is ready to truly attack again following her return to formThe 30yearold has looked a shadow of her best since sustaining a careerthreatening achilles rupture in 2020 But her performance here earned her 6556 points  her best tally since winning the world title in 2019  and has finally convinced her that she is on the road back Continue reading
Translated Text: JohnsonThompson can see a path back after secondplace finish in Götzis Briton second to Anna Hall at prestigious HypomeetingJohnsonThompson I have blown the cobwebs offKatarina JohnsonThompson believes she has rediscovered her mojo after an impressive secondplaced finish at the prestigious Hypomeeting in Götzis  and insists she is ready to truly attack again following her return to formThe 30yearold has looked a shadow of her best since sustaining a careerthreatening achilles rupture in 2020 But her performance here earned her 6556 points  her best tally since winning the world title in 2019  and has finally convinced her that she is on the road back Continue reading

Original Text: Aston Villa secure European spot with Ollie Watkins on target against Brighton When the fixtures for this season were first released it was a song no one expected to hear on the final day at Villa Park But as the celebrations began at the sound of the final whistle supporters of both sides joyously launched into a most unlikely rendition Were all going on a European tour they happily sang to one anotherWith Brightons first continental venture in their 122year history already assured this hugely entertaining Aston Villa win meant the home side will join them in Europe for the first time since 2010 A campaign that initially looked to be dominated by fears of the Championship extraordinarily ended with a spot in the Europa Conference League Continue reading
Translated Text: Aston Villa secure European spot with Ollie Watkins on target against Brighton When the fixtures for this season were first released it was a song no one expected to hear on the final day at Villa Park But as the celebrations began at the sound of the final whistle supporters of both sides joyously launched into a most unlikely rendition Were all going on a European tour they happily sang to one anotherWith Brightons first continental venture in their 122year history already assured this hugely entertaining Aston Villa win meant the home side will join them in Europe for the first time since 2010 A campaign that initially looked to be dominated by fears of the Championship extraordinarily ended with a spot in the Europa Conference League Continue reading

Original Text: Josef Newgardens audacious late pass clinches dramatic Indianapolis 500 Twotime IndyCar champion wins race for first timeNewgarden overtakes Marcus Ericsson in finals stagesJosef Newgarden finally captured a longawaited Indianapolis 500 win on Sunday and gave team owner Roger Penske his 19th and first since buying Indianapolis Motor Speedway Newgarden clinched victory after he made an audacious pass of defending race winner Marcus Ericsson during a frantic 25mile sprint to the finishAfter the race was redflagged for the third time in the closing laps Newgarden was moved from fourth to second by race control The twotime IndyCar champion who had been 0 for 11 in the Indy 500 took advantage of the decision by slingshotting around Ericsson on the restart and then holding him off through the last two turns for the win Continue reading
Translated Text: Josef Newgardens audacious late pass clinches dramatic Indianapolis 500 Twotime IndyCar champion wins race for first timeNewgarden overtakes Marcus Ericsson in finals stagesJosef Newgarden finally captured a longawaited Indianapolis 500 win on Sunday and gave team owner Roger Penske his 19th and first since buying Indianapolis Motor Speedway Newgarden clinched victory after he made an audacious pass of defending race winner Marcus Ericsson during a frantic 25mile sprint to the finishAfter the race was redflagged for the third time in the closing laps Newgarden was moved from fourth to second by race control The twotime IndyCar champion who had been 0 for 11 in the Indy 500 took advantage of the decision by slingshotting around Ericsson on the restart and then holding him off through the last two turns for the win Continue reading

Original Text: Evans suffers shocking French Open firstround defeat against Kokkinakis Briton beaten 64 64 64 by Australian opponent in ParisThere will be plenty of soulsearching  Its disappointingDan Evans said he will have ample soulsearching to do after his hopes of a positive French Open ended with a dispiriting 64 64 64 defeat against Thanasi Kokkinakis in the first roundI said the other day theres some soulsearching said Evans the 20th seed referencing his recent criticism of British tennis There will be plenty of that tonight Got to get on and try and get my game in a good spot Its shocking right now how I played today Its disappointing I thought I was in a good spot coming in but I felt like that the whole time Its not good enough Continue reading
Translated Text: Evans suffers shocking French Open firstround defeat against Kokkinakis Briton beaten 64 64 64 by Australian opponent in ParisThere will be plenty of soulsearching  Its disappointingDan Evans said he will have ample soulsearching to do after his hopes of a positive French Open ended with a dispiriting 64 64 64 defeat against Thanasi Kokkinakis in the first roundI said the other day theres some soulsearching said Evans the 20th seed referencing his recent criticism of British tennis There will be plenty of that tonight Got to get on and try and get my game in a good spot Its shocking right now how I played today Its disappointing I thought I was in a good spot coming in but I felt like that the whole time Its not good enough Continue reading

Original Text: Mauricio Pochettino signs contract to become Chelsea head coach until 2026 Argentinian manager to start job next week at Stamford BridgeOfficial announcement from club expected in the coming daysMauricio Pochettino is set to begin the job of rebuilding Chelsea after agreeing to sign a threeyear deal to become their head coachChelsea who have endured a campaign to forget since last years 25bn takeover by Todd Boehly and Clearlake Capital have been under pressure to make the right appointment since sacking Graham Potter They have had four managers this season and finished in the bottom half of the Premier League for the first time since 1996 after drawing 11 with Newcastle at Stamford Bridge yesterday Continue reading

Original Text: Latvia shock USA to win their first ice hockey world championship medal Kristian Rubins scores in overtime to seal 43 victoryAmericans lose bronze medal game for second straight yearCanada win title with 52 win over Germany in finalDefenseman Kristian Rubins scored his second goal 122 into overtime to lead Latvia to a 43 victory over the United States and earn a bronze medal at the ice hockey world championship on SundayCanada won the gold medal with a 52 victory over Germany in the final to claim their 28th world title Continue reading
Translated Text: Latvia shock USA to win their first ice hockey world championship medal Kristian Rubins scores in overtime to seal 43 victoryAmericans lose bronze medal game for second straight yearCanada win title with 52 win over Germany in finalDefenseman Kristian Rubins scored his second goal 122 into overtime to lead Latvia to a 43 victory over the United States and earn a bronze medal at the ice hockey world championship on SundayCanada won the gold medal with a 52 victory over Germany in the final to claim their 28th world title Continue reading

Original Text: Fans of relegated Leeds have been let down by baffling boardroom decisions  Louise Taylor Sam Allardyces back five failed to keep Tottenhams potent strike force at bay but poor recruitment has been the problemAs kickoff approached the strains of Dont You Forget About Me by Simple Minds drifted over the sound system Maybe it was the acoustics but the lyrics sounded particularly plaintiveBy the final whistle no song would have been sufficiently forlorn to match the mood as wholesale boos signalled that Leeds had just experienced footballs equivalent of stepping off the edge of the world Continue reading
Translated Text: Fans of relegated Leeds have been let down by baffling boardroom decisions  Louise Taylor Sam Allardyces back five failed to keep Tottenhams potent strike force at bay but poor recruitment has been the problemAs kickoff approached the strains of Dont You Forget About Me by Simple Minds drifted over the sound system Maybe it was the acoustics but the lyrics sounded particularly plaintiveBy the final whistle no song would have been sufficiently forlorn to match the mood as wholesale boos signalled that Leeds had just experienced footballs equivalent of stepping off the edge of the world Continue reading

Original Text: Selenskyj richtet Kampfansage an den Kreml In seiner täglichen Videobotschaft spricht der ukrainische Präsident über einen der größten Drohnenangriffe der russischen Armee seit Kriegsbeginn Und kündigt an Unsere gesamte Ukraine wird den Schlusspunkt unter die Geschichte des Moskauer Despotismus setzen Mehr im Liveticker
Translated Text: In his daily video message, the Ukrainian President talks about one of the biggest drone attacks by the Russian army since the beginning of the war and announces Our entire Ukraine will put the end of the story of Moscow's despotism More in the live ticker

Original Text: Goodison Park drags Everton players across the line once again  Will Unwin For the second season in succession fans responded to the managers call and roared on a team under threat of relegationWhether winning a title or securing safety the moment the historic goal hits the back of the net provides the same feeling Abdoulaye Doucouré thrashed the ball in here to test the foundations of the antiquated Goodison Park Every second of the past two seasons of Everton struggle was forgotten replaced with the glorious ecstasy of being a football fan without worries or concernsThese days of toil are painful for supporters who endure every emotion from despair to unparalleled jubilation For those decked in blue at Goodison survival means everything football is their joy their time away from what life throws at you and they will be thankful to Doucouré for ensuring their summer is not spent mourning a first relegation since 1951 The players did not let down the fans every single one put everything into the game for Everton buoyed by unrelenting support Continue reading
Translated Text: Goodison Park drags Everton players across the line once again  Will Unwin For the second season in succession fans responded to the managers call and roared on a team under threat of relegationWhether winning a title or securing safety the moment the historic goal hits the back of the net provides the same feeling Abdoulaye Doucouré thrashed the ball in here to test the foundations of the antiquated Goodison Park Every second of the past two seasons of Everton struggle was forgotten replaced with the glorious ecstasy of being a football fan without worries or concernsThese days of toil are painful for supporters who endure every emotion from despair to unparalleled jubilation For those decked in blue at Goodison survival means everything football is their joy their time away from what life throws at you and they will be thankful to Doucouré for ensuring their summer is not spent mourning a first relegation since 1951 The players did not let down the fans every single one put everything into the game for Everton buoyed by unrelenting support Continue reading

Original Text: Brentford seal double over Manchester City after Ethan Pinnocks late winner Manchester City 180 minutes from history were thankful the final 90 of their Premier League season passed without incident bar the minor blemish of Brentford becoming the only team to do a league double over themI dont have any complaints said Pep Guardiola The solidarity they have an exceptional team I have a lot of admiration for Thomas Frank the vibes that hes getting Continue reading
Translated Text: Brentford seal double over Manchester City after Ethan Pinnocks late winner Manchester City 180 minutes from history were thankful the final 90 of their Premier League season passed without incident bar the minor blemish of Brentford becoming the only team to do a league double over themI dont have any complaints said Pep Guardiola The solidarity they have an exceptional team I have a lot of admiration for Thomas Frank the vibes that hes getting Continue reading

Original Text: Southampton and Liverpool share eight goals in seesaw draw on day of farewells Pack up the euphoniums lay down the drumsticks put away the trumpets If they thought the Premier League would last for ever they were wrong There is always something slightly mournful about the prekick off playing of When the Saints Going Marching in and perhaps never more so than on Sunday with the brass band hinting it could be one of the causalities of the costcutting that will inevitably follow relegation The chaotically defiant entirely unfunereal performance that followed does not change thatThat is the sad truth when a team goes down The players the firstteam coaches and the directors will by and large be fine Fans may weep but for all the selfpity of a subset of modern support most will be back next season happy enough at a day out with family or friends whoever the opposition The people who suffer are those in less visible roles the academy coaches the analysts the catering staff and  perhaps  the brass band Thats where the cuts fall and where they are felt Continue reading
Translated Text: Southampton and Liverpool share eight goals in seesaw draw on day of farewells Pack up the euphoniums lay down the drumsticks put away the trumpets If they thought the Premier League would last for ever they were wrong There is always something slightly mournful about the prekick off playing of When the Saints Going Marching in and perhaps never more so than on Sunday with the brass band hinting it could be one of the causalities of the costcutting that will inevitably follow relegation The chaotically defiant entirely unfunereal performance that followed does not change thatThat is the sad truth when a team goes down The players the firstteam coaches and the directors will by and large be fine Fans may weep but for all the selfpity of a subset of modern support most will be back next season happy enough at a day out with family or friends whoever the opposition The people who suffer are those in less visible roles the academy coaches the analysts the catering staff and  perhaps  the brass band Thats where the cuts fall and where they are felt Continue reading

Original Text: Arsenal and Granit Xhaka bow out in style with demolition job against Wolves This time nobody could bear to see the back of Granit Xhaka We want you to stay sang the Emirates Stadium crowd as he walked off 15 minutes from time the serenade lengthy and heartfelt They knew that would not be possible and in the near future the object of their affection will sign for Bayer Leverkusen a better redemption arc would be hard to find though and the contrast with that bitter acrimonious trudge from the same pitch in October 2019 must surely have run through Xhakas mindThe fairytale signoff had already come Xhaka had never scored twice in a game for Arsenal but managed that within 14 minutes to his own mixture of delight and amusement When a loose ball bounced his way in front of goal shortly after the halfhour the likely outcome seemed too good to be true It was a glorious chance for Xhaka to leave with an improbable hattrick but he fluffed the effort and where such a mishap would once have met jeers the chuckles were generous Arsenals supporters learned to embrace their midfielder in the end warts and all Continue reading
Translated Text: Arsenal and Granit Xhaka bow out in style with demolition job against Wolves This time nobody could bear to see the back of Granit Xhaka We want you to stay sang the Emirates Stadium crowd as he walked off 15 minutes from time the serenade lengthy and heartfelt They knew that would not be possible and in the near future the object of their affection will sign for Bayer Leverkusen a better redemption arc would be hard to find though and the contrast with that bitter acrimonious trudge from the same pitch in October 2019 must surely have run through Xhakas mindThe fairytale signoff had already come Xhaka had never scored twice in a game for Arsenal but managed that within 14 minutes to his own mixture of delight and amusement When a loose ball bounced his way in front of goal shortly after the halfhour the likely outcome seemed too good to be true It was a glorious chance for Xhaka to leave with an improbable hattrick but he fluffed the effort and where such a mishap would once have met jeers the chuckles were generous Arsenals supporters learned to embrace their midfielder in the end warts and all Continue reading

Original Text: Ten Hag sends recruitment message after comeback Manchester United win After a victory that secured Manchester United third place on 75 points Erik ten Hag offered what could be read as a dig at the hierarchy for failing to back him in the January transfer windowThen Liverpool bought Cody Gakpo for 37m Newcastle recruited Anthony Gordon 45m and Chelsea splurged 320mplus on eight players including Enzo Fernández and Mykhailo Mudryk Yet after Cristiano Ronaldos departure during the World Cup and Christian Eriksens serious injury in January Ten Hag secured only loans for Wout Weghorst and Marcel Sabitzer Continue reading

Original Text: Celtic retain Scottish Womens Cup at Hampden with victory over Rangers Womens Scottish Cup final Rangers 02 CelticGoalscorers Flint 64 ORiordan 67Celtic retained the Scottish Womens Cup with a convincing 20 win against Rangers at Hampden Park The first time the teams had met in the final was also the first time the game was hosted at the national stadiumSecondhalf goals from Natasha Flint and Claire ORiordan secured victory for a Celtic side who posed more of an attacking threat throughout It was Malky Thomsons final game in charge of Rangers before he returns to coach the academy but his side who secured the Sky Sports Cup this season came up short Continue reading
Translated Text: Celtic retain Scottish Womens Cup at Hampden with victory over Rangers Womens Scottish Cup final Rangers 02 CelticGoalscorers Flint 64 ORiordan 67Celtic retained the Scottish Womens Cup with a convincing 20 win against Rangers at Hampden Park The first time the teams had met in the final was also the first time the game was hosted at the national stadiumSecondhalf goals from Natasha Flint and Claire ORiordan secured victory for a Celtic side who posed more of an attacking threat throughout It was Malky Thomsons final game in charge of Rangers before he returns to coach the academy but his side who secured the Sky Sports Cup this season came up short Continue reading

Original Text: Trippiers own goal earns Chelsea draw against Newcastle after Gordon opener While the players of Newcastle stood in front of the noisy travelling supporters and celebrated qualifying for the Champions League for the first time in two decades their counterparts in blue wandered sheepishly around the Stamford Bridge pitch and wondered what comes next after the season from hell finally came to an endThe immediate answer was a fond farewell to Frank Lampard after his stint as caretaker with a lively 11 draw with Newcastle In terms of the wider picture though Chelsea are in for a long rebuild They have finished in the bottom half for the first time since 1996 and while they have convinced Mauricio Pochettino to take over the reality for Chelseas owners Todd Boehly and Clearlake Capital is they will have little to celebrate when they mark the first anniversary of their takeover tomorrow Continue reading

Original Text: Nottingham Forests Awoniyi continues hot streak but Crystal Palace earn draw Roy Hodgson believes an 11thplaced finish for Crystal Palace is an excellent achievement With a 11 draw at home against Nottingham Forest the south London club finished in their highest position since 201718 in a campaign during which the 75yearold replaced Patrick Vieira in MarchA Will Hughes goal cancelled out an opener for Taiwo Awoniyi but Hodgson who refused to be drawn on his future was proud of the clubs accomplishment An 11th place for Palace in any season is always acceptable At the moment that is definitely where we want to be at least he said Continue reading

Original Text: Die Zahlen sehen gut aus für den amtierenden Präsidenten Die Türkei hält den Atem an Vorläufige Ergebnisse deuten darauf hin dass Erdogan ein weiteres Mal als Gewinner aus einer Präsidentschaftswahl geht In der Hauptstadt steht das jubelnde Publikum schon bereit WELTRedakteurin Carolina Drüten berichtet aus Ankara
Translated Text: The figures look good for the President-in-Office Turkey holds its breath Provisional results indicate that Erdogan is once again the winner of a presidential election In the capital, the cheering audience is already ready WORLDEditor Carolina Drüten reports from Ankara

Original Text: Carlisle promoted to League One after beating Stockport in Wembley shootout Carlisle returned to League One after edging past Stockport on penalties in a battle of endurance to clinch their first promotion for 17 years Paul Simpson was in charge back in 2006 when they won League Two and his homecoming return has been a monumental triumph after guiding them to victory in the playoff finalSimpson who helped Carlisle avoid relegation after returning for his second spell in February 2022 finally tasted success at Wembley after five defeats at the stadium I knew if we ever got there again my turn would come Simpson said The players have been absolutely magnificent We wanted to make it a good season but Im not sure many people gave us a chance Continue reading
Translated Text: Carlisle promoted to League One after beating Stockport in Wembley shootout Carlisle returned to League One after edging past Stockport on penalties in a battle of endurance to clinch their first promotion for 17 years Paul Simpson was in charge back in 2006 when they won League Two and his homecoming return has been a monumental triumph after guiding them to victory in the playoff finalSimpson who helped Carlisle avoid relegation after returning for his second spell in February 2022 finally tasted success at Wembley after five defeats at the stadium I knew if we ever got there again my turn would come Simpson said The players have been absolutely magnificent We wanted to make it a good season but Im not sure many people gave us a chance Continue reading

Original Text: Der SandraHüllerEffekt Gleich zwei Filme in denen Sandra Hüller mitspielt waren Favoriten der Jury beim Filmfestival von Cannes Warum geht die deutsche Schauspielerin selbst dann trotzdem leer aus Das hat mit der besonderen EinPreisLogik von Cannes zu tun
Translated Text: The SandraHüllerEffect Two films in which Sandra Hüller plays along were favorites of the jury at the Cannes Film Festival Why does the German actress even then go out empty This has to do with the special one-price logic of Cannes

Original Text: Die SPD hat keine Chance wenn sie meint jede Minderheit bedienen zu müssen Die SPD entdeckt die soziale Frage neu  schon werden Rufe nach mehr Staat und Klassenkampfrhetorik laut Auch Verfechter von Identitätspolitik mit mehr Queerfeminismus und Antirassismus treten auf den Plan Ist das der richtige Weg in einer Zeit in der die AfD die Partei in Umfragen fast einholt
Translated Text: The SPD has no chance if it thinks it has to serve every minority The SPD discovers the social question new already are calls for more state and class struggle rhetoric according to Also supporters of identity politics with more queerfeminism and anti-racism come on the plan Is this the right way at a time when the AfD almost catches up with the party in polls

Original Text: DeutschTürken deutlich für Erdogan  Autokorsos in Duisburg München und Berlin Recep Tayyip Erdogan steht vor einer weiteren fünfjährigen Amtszeit Oppositionsführer Kemal Kilicdaroglu sieht größere Probleme auf die Türkei zukommen Bei den DeutschTürken liegt Erdogan deutlich vorn
Translated Text: GermanTurks clearly for Erdogan Autokorsos in Duisburg Munich and Berlin Recep Tayyip Erdogan faces another five-year term Opposition leader Kemal Kilicdaroglu sees bigger problems coming to Turkey Erdogan is clearly ahead of the GermanTurks

Original Text: Der Unschlagbare Recep Tayyip Erdogan hat laut Wahlrat die Präsidentenwahl in der zweiten Runde gewonnen Mit ihrem Versprechen der Demokratisierung scheint die Opposition gescheitert zu sein Berlin und Brüssel müssen sich auf fünf weitere Jahre mit einem schwierigen Partner einstellen Und Erdogan kündigt bereits seinen nächsten Kampf an
Translated Text: The Unbeatable Recep Tayyip Erdogan has won the presidential election in the second round, according to the Electoral Council.With her promise of democratization, the opposition seems to have failed Berlin and Brussels must prepare for another five years with a difficult partner and Erdogan is already announcing his next fight

Original Text: Un paseo por la cuarta dimensión No podemos concebir la cuarta dimensión pero sí adentrarnos matemáticamente en ella
Translated Text: A walk through the fourth dimension We cannot conceive of the fourth dimension but we do enter into it mathematically.

Original Text: Eine Region wie eine tickende Zeitbombe Burkina Faso Mali Nigeria Niger In Westafrika unterwandern islamistische Terroristen einen Staat nach dem anderen destabilisieren eine ganze Region  mit Folgen auch für Europa Benin jedoch will sich nicht unterwerfen Unser Reporter konnte die Armee des kleinen Landes begleiten
Translated Text: A region like a ticking time bomb Burkina Faso Mali Nigeria Niger In West Africa Islamist terrorists infiltrate one state after another destabilize an entire region with consequences also for Europe Benin does not want to submit Our reporter was able to accompany the army of the small country

Original Text: CDU wirft AfD Blockade eines Untersuchungsausschusses vor Ein Untersuchungsausschuss soll klären ob die Thüringer Landesregierung bei Personalentscheidungen Fehler gemacht hat Weil die AfDFraktion Björn Höcke zum stellvertretenden Vorsitzenden machen will ist unklar ob das Gremium seine Arbeit wird aufnehmen können
Translated Text: CDU accuses AfD of blocking a committee of inquiry A committee of inquiry should clarify whether the Thuringian state government has made mistakes in personnel decisions Because the AfD Group wants to make Björn Höcke a deputy chairman is unclear whether the body will be able to start its work

Original Text: Der gescheiterte Papst Als Jorge Bergoglio vor zehn Jahren Papst Franziskus wurde waren die Hoffnungen groß Er erkannte die Existenz sexuellen Missbrauchs an verurteilte ihn traf Betroffene Heute macht sich Ernüchterung breit Franziskus oberster Kinderschützer tritt sogar aus der Kommission aus Was ist passiert
Translated Text: The failed Pope When Jorge Bergoglio became Pope Francis ten years ago, the hopes were great He recognized the existence of sexual abuse condemned him met today, disillusionment spreads Francis supreme child protector even quits the Commission What happened

Original Text: Landwirt für einen Tag Wenige Großstädter wissen wie hart das Leben als Landwirt ist Auf dem Bauernhof von Christian Braune können sie einen Einblick in die Arbeit gewinnen Unser Reporter macht mit Ein Tag voller neuer Erkenntnisse  der Weg zum Kürbis ist lang und voller Widrigkeiten
Translated Text: Farmer for a day Few big cities know how hard life is as a farmer On the farm of Christian Braune you can gain an insight into the work Our reporter makes with a day full of new insights the way to the pumpkin is long and full of adversities

Original Text: So taumelt die Linke in den Niedergang Der zermürbende Streit mit Sahra Wagenknecht ist nur eines der Probleme der Linkspartei In anderen Feldern sind die Defizite ebenso gravierend Inzwischen fehlt selbst vielen Linken die Fantasie wie das noch zu retten sein soll Optimisten in der Partei hoffen auf einen besonderen Effekt
Translated Text: That's how the left is in decline The grueling dispute with Sahra Wagenknecht is only one of the problems of the Left Party In other fields the deficits are just as serious Meanwhile, even many leftists lack the imagination to be saved as the optimists in the party hope for a special effect

Original Text: Opposition beklagt Angriff auf Wahlbeobachter  Kilicdaroglu spricht von schweren Bedingungen Schläge und zerstörte Telefone In der Türkei kam es offenbar zu einem Zwischenfall bei der Präsidentenwahl Wahlbeobachter der Oppositionspartei sollen angegriffen worden sein klagt deren Fraktionsvorsitzender Kilicdaroglu Erdogans Herausforderer rief dazu auf die Wahlurnen zu schützen
Translated Text: Opposition complains attack on election observer Kilicdaroglu speaks of severe conditions blows and destroyed phones In Turkey there was apparently an incident in the presidential election election election observers of the opposition party are supposed to have been attacked complaining their group chairman Kilicdaroglu Erdogan's challenger called to protect the ballot boxes

Original Text: Die Menschen haben noch Hoffnung Sie rufen Recht und Gerechtigkeit Amtsinhaber Erdogan gegen Herausforderer Kilicdaroglu Mehr als 60 Millionen Türken sind zu einer Richtungsentscheidung aufgerufen Vor der zweiten Runde der Präsidentenwahl ging es vor allem um das Thema Migration WELTRedakteurin Carolina Drüten berichtet aus Ankara
Translated Text: People still have hope They call for right and justice incumbent Erdogan against challenger Kilicdaroglu More than 60 million Turks are called for a decision on the direction Before the second round of the presidential election, it was mainly about migration WORLDEditor Carolina Drüten reports from Ankara

Original Text: Bin sehr traurig darüber dass die Türkei sich immer weiter von Europa entfernt Der oppositionelle türkische Präsidentschaftskandidat Kemal Kilicdaroglu hat seine Mitbürger bei der Stichwahl aufgefordert die autoritäre Herrschaft von Amtsinhaber Recep Tayyip Erdogan zu beenden Über die Bedeutung der Wahl spricht die Frauenrechtlerin und Rechtsanwältin Seyran Ates bei WELT
Translated Text: I am very sad that Turkey is moving further and further away from Europe The opposition Turkish presidential candidate Kemal Kilicdaroglu has called on his fellow citizens to end the authoritarian rule of incumbent Recep Tayyip Erdogan in the run-off election.The women's rights activist and lawyer Seyran Ates speaks at WORLD about the importance of the election.

Original Text: AfDAbgeordneter im Bundestag beschäftigt langjährigen Neonazi Benedikt Kaiser bewegte sich zwischen 2006 und 2011 im Umfeld neonazistischer Organisationen wie den Nationalen Sozialisten Chemnitz der Hooligangruppe NSBoys und der NPD Nun hat er ein Büro im Bundestag  der AfDAbgeordnete Jürgen Pohl hat ihn als Mitarbeiter eingestellt
Translated Text: AfDDeputy member of the Bundestag working for many years Neonazi Benedikt Kaiser moved between 2006 and 2011 in the context of neo-Nazi organizations such as the National Socialists Chemnitz of the Hooligan group NSBoys and the NPD Now he has an office in the Bundestag of the AfDDeputy member Jürgen Pohl hired him as an employee

Original Text: SPDEnergiepolitikerin Nina Scheer im WELTInterview Eine weitere Verzögerung bei der Beratung und Verabschiedung des Heizungsgesetzes durch die FDP geht nach Überzeugung der SPDEnergiepolitikerin Nina Scheer zulasten der Qualität des Gesetzes
Translated Text: SPDEnergiepolitiker Nina Scheer in the WORLDInterview A further delay in the consultation and adoption of the heating law by the FDP goes to the SPDEnergiepolitiker Nina Scheer at the expense of the quality of the law

Original Text: Der ErdoganCode  deshalb lieben ihn die Türken Recep Tayyip Erdogan bleibt wohl Präsident der Türkei und dominiert die dortige Politik seit nunmehr zwanzig Jahren Die zentralanatolische Stadt Orta ist ein Beispiel für seinen Erfolg hier holte er 88 Prozent Den Menschen gefällt besonders das was den Westen an Erdogan aufregt
Translated Text: The ErdoganCode therefore the Turks love him Recep Tayyip Erdogan probably remains president of Turkey and dominates the local politics for now twenty years The Central Anatolian city of Orta is an example of his success here he brought 88 percent People especially like what upsets the West Erdogan

Original Text: SPDChefin warnt vor überzogenem Vorgehen gegen Klimaaktivisten Sie kleben sich an Autos fest beschmieren Gebäude blockieren Straßen  die Protestaktionen der Letzten Generation reißen nicht ab Sie könne verstehen dass viele Menschen deshalb verärgert seien sagt SPDChefin Esken Zugleich mahnt sie zu Besonnenheit
Translated Text: SPDChef warns against excessive action against climate activists You stick to cars lubricating buildings Blocking streets The protest actions of the last generation Don't tear off You can understand that that's why many people are angry says SPDChef Esken At the same time she calls for prudence

Original Text: Mit der Armee von Benin auf der Suche nach Terroristen Islamistische Terrorgruppen breiten sich in Westafrika immer weiter aus Länder wie Mali oder Burkina Faso sehen weitgehend hilflos zu Das kleine Benin jedoch will sich wehren  und rüstet auf Unsere Reporter haben die Armee begleitet
Translated Text: With the army of Benin in search of terrorists Islamist terrorist groups are spreading in West Africa more and more from countries like Mali or Burkina Faso look largely helpless Little Benin, however, wants to fight back and prepare herself Our reporters have accompanied the army

Original Text: Das geplante Gebäudeenergiegesetz ist gut gemeint aber schlecht gemacht Bei den Menschen herrsche Klimafrust statt Klimalust sagt der Hauptgeschäftsführer des Deutschen Städtebunds und warnt vor dem Scheitern der Wärmewende Es brauche mehr Realitätssinn Habecks Kompromissbereitschaft sei ein gutes Zeichen eine grundlegende Überarbeitung aber unabdingbar
Translated Text: The planned building energy law is well-intentioned but poorly done With the people ruling climate frustration instead of climate lust, the managing director of the German Association of Cities says and warns of the failure of the heat transition More sense of reality needed Habel's willingness to compromise is a good sign a fundamental revision but indispensable

Original Text: Grüne rutschen auf niedrigsten Wert seit 2018  AfD legt zu Die Zustimmung für die Grünen nimmt laut InsaUmfrage weiter ab Sie sank auf den niedrigsten Wert seit fünf Jahren Auch die SPD verlor einen Punkt Neben den Liberalen konnte die AfD hinzugewinnen  sie liegt bei 18 Prozent Mit der Arbeit der Regierung ist nur etwa jeder Vierte zufrieden
Translated Text: Green slips to the lowest value since 2018 AfD increases According to InsaUmfrage, approval for the Greens continues to decline It fell to the lowest value in five years The SPD also lost one point In addition to the Liberals, the AfD was able to gain it at 18 percent With the government's work only about one in four is satisfied

Original Text: Grundsatzeinigung im Schuldenstreit zwischen USRegierung und Republikanern Im USSchuldenstreit haben Präsident Joe Biden und der Republikaner Kevin McCarthy einen Durchbruch erzielt und einen Zahlungsausfall der größten Volkswirtschaft der Welt voraussichtlich abgewendet Das Vorhaben muss noch vom Kongress abgesegnet werden
Translated Text: Basic agreement in the debt dispute between US government and Republicans In the US debt dispute, President Joe Biden and Republican Kevin McCarthy have achieved a breakthrough and are expected to avert a default of the world's largest economy.

Original Text: Setzt die falschen Anreize  Spahn fordert sofortiges Ende der Rente mit 63 Menschen in Deutschland gehen immer häufiger früh in Rente Mit Hinblick auf den Fachkräftemangel sei das ein ernstes Problem moniert Jens Spahn Die Menschen fehlten bitterlich auf dem Arbeitsmarkt Er fordert daher ein Ende der Rente mit 63 Die Linke nennt den Vorstoß respektlos
Translated Text: Putting the wrong incentives Spahn calls for an immediate end to the pension with 63 people in Germany more and more often retire early With regard to the shortage of skilled workers this is a serious problem moaned Jens Spahn People were missing bitterly on the labour market He therefore calls for an end to the pension with 63 The left calls the advance disrespectful

Original Text: Türkei entscheidet in Stichwahl über Präsidenten Im Rennen um das Präsidentenamt in der Türkei treten Amtsinhaber Recep Tayyip Erdogan und Herausforderer Kemal Kilicdaroglu in einer Stichwahl gegeneinander an Die Wahllokale öffneten am Sonntagmorgen um 700 Uhr MESZ Der 69jährige Erdogan gilt als Favorit
Translated Text: Turkey decides on Presidents in the run-off In the race for the presidential office in Turkey, incumbent Recep Tayyip Erdogan and challenger Kemal Kilicdaroglu compete against each other in a run-off election The polling stations opened at 700 a.m. on Sunday morning The 69-year-old Erdogan is regarded as a favorite

Original Text: Zu Besuch in Erdogans deutscher Hochburg Nirgendwo sonst in Deutschland wählen so viele Auslandstürken den amtierenden Präsidenten Recep Tayyip Erdogan wie in NordrheinWestfalen Wie ist die Beliebtheit des autoritären Islamisten zu erklären Eine Spurensuche
Translated Text: To visit Erdogan's German stronghold Nowhere else in Germany so many foreign Turks choose the current President Recep Tayyip Erdogan as in North Rhine-Westphalia How to explain the popularity of the authoritarian Islamist A search for traces

Original Text: Warum der Favorit Erdogan heißt  und alles andere was Sie zur Stichwahl wissen sollten An diesem Sonntag stimmen die Türken erneut über ihren Präsidenten ab Amtsinhaber Erdogan geht stärker als erwartet in die Stichwahl Was bedeutet das für die türkische Demokratie  und welche Folgen hat das für Europa und die Nato WELT beantwortet die wichtigsten Fragen
Translated Text: Why the favorite is Erdogan and everything else you should know about the final election This Sunday the Turks will vote again about their president from the incumbent Erdogan goes more than expected into the final election What does this mean for Turkish democracy and what consequences this has for Europe and the NATO WORLD answers the most important questions

Original Text: Parlament in Texas stimmt für vorläufige Amtsenthebung von Justizminister Seit Jahren steht Texas Generalstaatsanwalt und Justizminister im Visier des FBI nun könnte es für den Republikaner eng werden Unter anderem wegen des Vorwurfs der Korruption hat das Repräsentantenhaus des USBundesstaates gegen Ken Paxton ein Amtsenthebungsverfahren eingeleitet
Translated Text: Parliament in Texas votes for temporary withdrawal from office of Minister of Justice For years, Texas Attorney General and Minister of Justice has been targeted by the FBI now it could become tight for the Republican Among other things, because of the allegation of corruption, the House of Representatives of the US state has initiated an impeachment procedure against Ken Paxton

Original Text: USRegierung und Republikaner erzielen Grundsatzeinigung im Schuldenstreit Bei den Verhandlungen um eine Anhebung der Schuldenobergrenze in den USA gibt es einen Durchbruch Die USRegierung und Vertreter aus dem Kongress erreichten eine vorläufige Einigung Senat und Repräsentantenhaus müssen dem Deal jedoch noch zustimmen
Translated Text: US government and Republicans reach agreement on debt dispute In negotiations to raise the debt ceiling in the US, however, there is a breakthrough The US government and Congressional representatives reached a preliminary agreement Senate and House of Representatives still have to agree to the deal

Original Text: Erneut Großdemo gegen Serbiens Regierung  Präsident gibt Parteivorsitz ab Zum vierten Mal seit zwei Schusswaffenangriffen mit 18 Todesopfern haben in Belgrad Zehntausende gegen die Regierung demonstriert Präsident Aleksandar Vucic trat vom Vorsitz der Regierungspartei zurück Forderungen nach einer Übergangsregierung lehnte er jedoch ab
Translated Text: Again Grand Demo against Serbia's Government President issues party presidency For the fourth time since two firearm attacks with 18 fatalities have demonstrated tens of thousands against the government in Belgrade President Aleksandar Vucic resigned from the presidency of the ruling party but rejected demands for a transitional government

Original Text: Mehr als 1500 Festnahmen bei Demo von Extinction Rebellion in Den Haag Zum siebten Mal wollten Aktivisten einen Streckenabschnitt der Autobahn unweit des Parlaments und Regierungssitzes der Niederlande blockieren Doch die Polizei griff durch Hunderte Demonstranten wurden von der Straße entfernt
Translated Text: More than 1500 arrests at the Demo of Extinction Rebellion in The Hague For the seventh time, activists wanted to block a section of the highway near the parliament and government seat of the Netherlands But the police seized by hundreds of demonstrators were removed from the street

Original Text: Die Zeit ist gekommen zurückzuholen was uns gehört Der Oberbefehlshaber der ukrainischen Armee Walerij Saluschnyj hat ein Rekrutierungsvideo veröffentlicht das Vorbereitungen zum Kampf zeigt Weitere hochrangige Vertreter der Ukraine deuten einen baldigen Beginn der Gegenoffensive an Mehr im Liveticker
Translated Text: The time has come to get back what belongs to us The commander-in-chief of the Ukrainian army Waleriy Salushnyj has released a recruitment video showing preparations for the fight Other high-ranking representatives of Ukraine indicate an early start of the counter-offensive More in the live ticker

Original Text: Hohe JobWechselbereitschaft bei über 50Jährigen Fast jeder fünfte Arbeitnehmer über 50 ist offen für einen neuen Job Das geht aus einer ForsaUmfrage hervor Als Hauptgründe für einen JobWechsel nannten die Befragten etwa zu viel Stress und zu wenig Gehalt Beim neuen Arbeitgeber wäre den meisten vor allem eines wichtig
Translated Text: High job willingness among over 50-year-olds Almost one in five employees over 50 is open to a new job This results from a Forsa survey As the main reason for a job transition, the respondents mentioned about too much stress and too little salary In the new employer, most of them would be important

Original Text: Szenario Iran  Dann steigt Moskaus Börse um Hunderte Prozent Der Vizechef der russischen Zentralbank prophezeit dem dortigen Aktienmarkt einen Höhenflug wie im Iran Der iranische Kapitalmarkt hat sich zwischen 2014 und 2022 versechzehnfacht Wie soll sich das in Putins Land wiederholen  mitten im Krieg trotz der Sanktionen
Translated Text: Scenario Iran Then Moscow's stock market rises by hundreds of percent The Vice-Chief of the Russian Central Bank predicts that the stock market there is flying high as in Iran The Iranian capital market has increased tenfold between 2014 and 2022 How should Putin's country repeat itself in the middle of the war despite sanctions

Original Text: Gamechanger für Familien  Auf dieses EAuto habe ich seit Jahren gewartet Der Autor ist schon lange auf der Suche nach einem alltagstauglichen elektrischen Kleinbus Alle bisherigen Tests endeten enttäuschend Auch dem neuen Modell von VW dem IDBuzz traute er wenig zu Ein kolossaler Irrtum wie sich in der Praxis herausstellte Denn der Bus kann fast alles
Translated Text: Gamechanger for families I've been waiting for this car for years The author has long been looking for an electric minibus suitable for everyday use All previous tests ended disappointingly Even the new model of VW the IDBuzz he dared little to A colossal error as it turned out in practice Because the bus can do almost anything

Original Text: TrigemaChef Wolfgang Grupp im WELTInterview Luisa Neubauer sorgt mit einem Appell für Wirbel Sie ruft Arbeitnehmerinnen und Arbeitnehmer dazu auf ihre berufliche Situation zu überdenken und gegebenenfalls sogar zu kündigen Darüber spricht TrigemaChef Wolfgang Grupp im WELTInterview
Translated Text: TrigemaChief Wolfgang Grupp in the WORLDInterview Luisa Neubauer makes an appeal for vertebrae She calls on employees to reconsider their professional situation and, if necessary, even to cancel This is what TrigemaChief Wolfgang Grupp speaks in the WORLDInterview

Original Text: Der neue Zwang der Grünen zum Kompromiss Die drei AmpelParteien wollen das Gebäudeenergiegesetz GEG jeweils so umgestalten dass es zu den Interessen der eigenen Klientel passt Dabei sollte es vor der Sommerpause fertig sein Die eigentlich wichtige Frage stellt sich aber wohl im Herbst
Translated Text: The new coercion of the Greens to compromise The three traffic lights parties want to transform the building energy law GEG in such a way that it fits the interests of their own clientele.It should be ready before the summer break.

Original Text: Das PlünderungsProblem verrät viel über den dramatischen Zustand der USA Überfälle im Einzelhandel haben in den USA rasant zugenommen immer mehr Geschäfte müssen schließen um ihre Mitarbeiter zu schützen Andere sehen sich zu drastischen Maßnahmen gezwungen
Translated Text: The looting problem reveals much about the dramatic state of the US retail robberies have rapidly increased in the US More and more businesses need to close to protect their employees Others are forced to take drastic measures

Original Text: Akkoord over Amerikaans schuldenplafond klaar voor Congres zegt Biden Het akkoord over de verhoging van het schuldenplafond in de Verenigde Staten is klaar om aan het Congres te worden voorgelegd Dat heeft de Amerikaanse president Joe Biden zondag plaatselijke tijd bekendgemaakt Hij riep de parlementsleden op om de tekst goed te keuren
Translated Text: Agreement on American debt ceiling ready for Congress says Biden The agreement on the increase of the debt ceiling in the United States is ready to be presented to Congress That's what American President Joe Biden announced on Sunday local time He called on MEPs to approve the text

Original Text: Verlies voor socialisten van premier Pedro Sánchez bij Spaanse verkiezingen winst voor rechts De socialistische partij PSOE van de Spaanse premier Pedro Sánchez heeft zondag bij de regionale en lokale verkiezingen verlies geboekt De rechtse Partido Popular PP verzamelde de meeste stemmen maar ook het radicaalrechtse Vox ging erop vooruit
Translated Text: Loss for Socialists of Prime Minister Pedro Sánchez in Spanish Elections Profit for Right The Socialist Party of Spanish Prime Minister Pedro Sánchez lost in the regional and local elections on Sunday The right-wing Partido Popular PP collected most votes but also the radical right-wing Vox improved.

Original Text: De ferias y elecciones En lo literario han sido dos semanas gratificantes Estuve en la Feria del libro de Teruel donde siempre aguarda un generoso número de lectores para que les dedique tus novelas Presenté La soledad del perro acompañado por Tomás Cirujeda de la Librería Escolar un establecimiento con gran solera en el que tus novelas están siempre en primera fila y donde Iñaki y Juan se encargan de recomendarlas a sus clientes con afecto Una feria bien organizada con un público soberbio que visita con alegría las casetas instaladas alrededor de La Glorieta Una cita que deberías conocer para comprobar lo mucho que se te estima en la Ciudad de los Amantes Este sábado participé en la Fira del llibre dOnda donde hablamos de ti más que de otra cosa Se encargó de conducir el acto Inma Pitarch más conocida en el mundo de las letras como Perica la Literaria Perica es una buena amiga y una gran profesional Ella se quedó prendada de otro personaje que de haber seguido en mis papeles te hubiera hecho sombra La cuestión es que es un evento que me encanta por todo el cariño que reciboPero en realidad hoy te escribo por las dudas que me asaltan de cara al próximo domingo jornada en la que acudiremos a las urnas Ya sé que no me vas a decir cuál es tu elección pero si te lo pregunto me siento mejor Leo los proyectos de unos y de otros en ocasiones veo promesas y en otras sólo ilusiones No puedo evitar pensar que si hicieran una parte de todo lo que anuncian estaríamos salvados Cada uno pide por lo suyo como el feligrés arrodillado en el banco de una iglesia pero a los que esperamos soluciones en materia de salud se nos hace muy larga la espera Todo es importante todo es esencial sin embargo escucho y leo poco o nada sobre financiación y compromiso real con las llamadas enfermedades raras que viendo la pésima colaboración de las instituciones deberían llamarlas enfermedades olvidadas Necesitamos mucha más inversión más implicación por parte de los políticos más científicos cualificados Cuántos Los que hagan falta Que quiten personajes apoltronados en sus butacas y en su lugar pongan jóvenes sobradamente preparados para unirse en la carrera por encontrar el antídoto que ayude a paliar el dolor de los que padecen 1 voto 1 ayuda científica Ese es el eslogan que me gustaría leer Y a ti
Translated Text: From fairs and elections In the literary area have been two rewarding weeks I was in the Fair of the book of Teruel where always waits a generous number of readers to dedicate your novels Presenté The solitude of the dog accompanied by Tomás Cirujeda of the School Bookshop an establishment with great solera in which your novels are always in the first row and where Iñaki and Juan take charge of recommending them to their clients with affection A fair well organized with a superb audience that visits with joy the booths installed around La Glorieta A quotation that you should know to check how much you are esteemed in the City of Lovers This Saturday I participated in the Fira of the llibre dOnda where we talked about you more than anything else It was taken to conduct the act Inma Pitarch most known in the world of the letters as Perica la Literaria Perica is a good friend and a great professional She stayed only in the matter of having followed you shadow The question is that it is an event that I love for all the affection I receiveBut today I write to you for the doubts that I am afraid of the next

Original Text: Un puente el puerto y la primera falla Para el propietario de la bodega del Secanet poder cruzar el río Mijares por la parte del muñón del pont romà de Burriana se le antojó una oportunidad de negocio Él ya dominaba el arte de los destilados en el alambique y la alquimia de las esencias para mezclar con la gaseosa Pero a pesar de su pujanza con la venta de orujos y jarabes también quiso construir una pasarela que llevase de una orilla a otra Tal vez creyó que por allí donde los romanos levantaron su puente iban a llegar hasta el establecimiento legiones de parroquianos de la parte de Almassora Y unos buenos ingresos adicionales pues una vez que construyó su pasarela estableció el pago de un peaje para quienes quisieran atravesarla Al frente de la aduana puso a una hija con un trastorno que igualmente podía servirle la chica ladraba Esto no impedía que cumpliera con el cometido de cobrar o espantar Pero contrariamente a los cálculos del bodeguero el puente representó su final Por los tablones de madera unos almazorinos pasaron sin satisfacer el impuesto fluvial Conquistada la ribera sur sin más dificultad saquearon la cantina y asesinaron al dueño La hija guardiana entonces solo pudo lanzar un aullido interminableEl geógrafo de la Universidad Valencia Emili Obiol comenzó su clase magistral explicando a los alumnos el extraño rol de Burriana en la Terra Plana Según el profesor esta ciudad fue la capital de un vasto hinterland del tiempo de los moros el palmerar de Borriana que extendía sus dominios hasta la alquería de Benarabe el actual Castellón Al sur por la línea de costa de la Serratella saldrían los bajeles cargados de mercancías procedentes del castillo de Onda hacía los puertos del Mare Nostrum Siglos más tarde el insignificante fillol castellonense que hasta en su topónimo valenciano encierra el diminutivo creció y se hizo más grande que Borriana i Borriol juntos los padres de la criatura Entonces un alumno le lanzó una pregunta a Obiol qué sucedió para que el antiguo centro comarcal diera paso a otra capital mas si pensamos que el gen capitalino todavía lo conservaban los burrianenses aunque ya no capitalicen nada El geógrafo no era partidario de la fantasía sin embargo haciendo una excepción contestó con la explicación que manejaban los burrianeneses para justificar que el nuevo mapa provincial los relegase al papel de rey destronado Al parecer el día que repartieron el título de capital de provincia el alcalde de Burriana fue reclamado en presencia del Secretario de Estado don Javier de Burgos en tiempos de la regente María Cristina El regidor en cuanto supo que su ciudad era la elegida le preguntó al responsable de la moderna división civil del territorio como base de la administración interior Señor y esto cuánto cuesta El político y alto funcionario muy sorprendido contestó Nada es de balde El alcalde Entonces si no vale nada que se la quede otro La cuestión de la capitalidad pues obedece a un intangible la idiosincrasia más que a una gracia caída del cielo madrileño Burriana ese núcleo principal en la época musulmana sin duda perdió la centralidad En gran medida quedó al margen de las vías de comunicación ni pasó la romana vía Augusta ni las románticas vías del tren Tampoco el Camino Real ni la Nacional 340 ni la autopista del Mediterráneo Pero contra todo pronóstico desde mediados del siglo XIX el cultivo y la exportación de naranja insuflaron nuevamente el viejo aliento burrianense de ser un foco irradiador Así los trámites hasta conseguir la dotación del puerto comercial fueron largos y rocambolescos En paralelo las nuevas edificaciones modernistas dotaron de una piel más urbana y cosmopolita a su casco histórico Y por último un ingrediente que resultó fabuloso la adopción de las fallas la fiesta valenciana sin complejos De este modo la urbe citrícola de proyección mundial y la capital de la provincia ensimismada con su suerte administrativa comenzaron a mirarse de reojo Castellón había de medirse concontra Valencia y a Burriana se la empezó a ver como un caballo de Troya de cartón piedra con la forma de un monumento josefino Los más viejos del solar recuerdan que también en la ciudad del río Seco se quemó una falla en los felices años 20 Pero esta purificación del fuego y la sátira no arraigaron Tampoco cuajaron aquellas primeras gayatas escultóricas de la posguerra que recordaban más a los ninots inflamables que a las luminarias sense foc ni fum El extremo de esta pugna podríamos situarlo a finales de los años 50 Entonces en medio de la algarabía de los días de Magdalena una noche un gamberro prendió la gayata de la plaza Mayor Las autoridades en un primer momento culparon a Pepe Moros un ficha de marca mayor que para más inri era natural de Burriana Blanco y en botella horchata Después el individuo pudo demostrar que tenía coartada y fue exculpado del castigo Sin embargo siempre quedó la sospechaCastellón de la Plana como su equipo de fútbol era de primera división y el régimen no perdía un Certamen Literario para enaltecer ese privilegiado destino en lo universal que era ser la capital de la provincia Romualdo de Toledo uno de los oradores que vino a las fiestas de la Magdalena a regalar los oídos a los castellonenses capitalinos pronunció un discurso delirante Habló de la historia de España como si se tratara de una romería que ha encontrado en todo momento su hombre providencial y su caña para apoyarse Por allí desfilaron Recaredo Nebrija Alfonso VIII el Batallador Alfonso X el Sabio el Compromiso de Caspe Isabel y Fernando Felipe II Y claro está cuando en los últimos tiempos venía el comunismo mezclándose con la ciénaga pestilente del materialismo más ateo que quería destrozar completamente España tenemos la gayata de nuestro invicto Caudillo Franco En efecto para el mantenedor la lucecita del Pardo que permanecía siempre encendida era una gayata nunca una falla

Original Text: IA LLEVAMOS toda la semana a vueltas con la Inteligencia Artificial como tema de actualidad Los informativos nos hablan de la comparecencia del CEO de ChatGPT en el congreso americano advirtiendo de los peligros de no regular esta nueva herramienta tecnológica Al mismo tiempo nuestras redes sociales están ya plagadas de fotógrafos artísticos que fascinados por las infinitas posibilidades de la IA aplicada a la fotografía crean y crean imágenes tan bellas como hiperrealistas Y por supuesto todos los que nos dedicamos a la comunicación hemos querido tantear el famoso chat inteligente para ver todo lo que ofrece Lo cierto es que ofrece todo lo que cuentan y más De hecho cada nueva aplicación basada en la Inteligencia Artificial te sorprende con más capacidades que la anterior Y sí asusta y muchoSi internet ya nos ha convertido en unos peleles de los algoritmos verdaderas víctimas de los fakes y la desinformación qué no seremos cuando sea imposible distinguir la realidad de la ficción Si la agenda setting ya nos enfila como corderos hacia donde debemos dirigir nuestra mirada pública y los temas que nos deben parecer importantes en cada momento qué no pensaremos cuando la verosimilitud de las informaciones nos lleven a creer en hechos que nadie sabrá a ciencia cierta si han sucedido o noLa realidad es que las máquinas están aprendiendo nuestros conocimientos nuestro lenguaje nuestra respuesta a los inputs que recibimos en definitiva las máquinas aprenden a comportarse como humanos Al más puro estilo de la ciencia ficción del siglo XX el futuro ya está aquíPero además esta extraordinaria herramienta se pone de moda casi en los mismos días en los que la noticia de que los escolares españoles son cada vez más deficientes en comprensión lectora y escrita Es decir las máquinas se vuelven inteligentes mientras los seres humanos nos volvemos cada vez más tontos Lo cual abunda en la sensación que estamos desembocando en un descalabro monumentalNo es fácil ponerle puertas al campo Los avances científicos siempre han puesto al ser humano en una encrucijada La energía atómica puede utilizarse para el bien y ser una de las peores armas Internet nos ha abierto un mercado mundial acercando conocimiento a todas las personas pero al mismo tiempo genera muchos peligros como la desinformación la ciberdelincuencia y un largo etcétera Ahora la humanidad deberá valorar qué hacer con la IA que tantos beneficios nos puede aportar pero que también nos va a despojar de la exclusiva esencia del ser humanoNo sé si seremos capaces de regular esta tecnología ni hasta dónde nos hará llegar Pero sí sé que cada vez más la autoría humana la presencialidad la valía del puño y letra va a tener un valor especial y único

Original Text: El arte te cambia EL polifacético cineasta y pintor frustrado David Lynch afirmó aquello de que el arte no cambia nada el arte te cambia a ti Una afirmación cargada de verdad que este creador y muchos afortunados hemos experimentado en nuestras carnes Hay trabajos que simplemente haces para ganarte la vida para sobrevivir por herencia familiar por azar incluso algunos con la fortuna de ser vocacionales Pero en raras ocasiones tienen esa cualidad transformadora El arte en cualquiera de sus disciplinas sí la posee Me gusta decir que tengo la inmensa suerte de dedicarme en cuerpo y alma al que creo sin duda que es el mejor trabajo del mundo Mi manifiesta debilidad por las artes plásticas no me impide ser una ávida espectadora de teatro danza música etc Cada obra que he visto cada composición que he escuchado cada viaje compartido cada libro que he leído han dejado un poso en mí Es como esa leyenda del maestro y su alumno que le pregunta frustrado Cuál es el propósito de la lectura ya que ha leído muchos libros pero ha olvidado la mayoría Con una sencilla tarea de recoger agua en un colador sucio el sabio hace comprender al joven que lo importante no es guardar en la memoria todo lo recogido sino el efecto limpiador que esas ideas y emociones han generado en su personaDesde hace más de dos décadas el arte en todas sus manifestaciones ha limpiado esos agujeros obturados Si no lo hubiesen hecho con toda seguridad ahora sería una persona diferente Sería más vulnerable menos reflexiva más susceptible de ser manipulada y sin la capacidad crítica que tan necesaria es en esta época de la postverdad El periodista Walter Lippmann fue el que dijo aquello de que donde todos piensan igual nadie piensa mucho En una era donde prima la opinión más que la información todos deberíamos tener una tabla de salvación En mi caso es el arteEsta semana estamos celebrando el Día Internacional de los Museos que cada año tiene un lema En 2023 se ha elegido sostenibilidad y bienestar Afirma el ICOM que los museos contribuyen al apoyo a la acción climática el fomento de la inclusión la lucha contra el aislamiento social y la mejora de la salud mental Y yo añado cuidado pueden cambiarte la vida
Translated Text: The art changes you The multifaceted filmmaker and frustrated painter David Lynch affirmed that art does not change anything the art affirms to you A statement loaded with truth that this creator and many lucky ones we have experienced in our meats There are jobs that you simply do to earn your life to survive by family inheritance by chance even some with the fortune to be vocational But on rare occasions they have that transforming quality Art in any of its disciplines does possess it I like to say that I have the immense luck to dedicate myself in body and soul to which I doubtless believe it is the best work in the world My manifest weakness for the plastic arts does not prevent me from being an avid spectator of theatre dance music etc. Every work that I have seen every composition I have heard every shared trip every book that I have read have left a pose in me It is like that legend of the teacher and his student that asks him frustrated What is the purpose of reading since he has read many books but forgotten most With a simple task of collecting water in a dirty colander the wise makes understand the young that the important thing is not to keep in memory I now but the cleaner that those ideas and emotions have generated in his person

Original Text: Cambio de paradigma La exposición Cambio de Paradigma es consecuencia de mi personal viaje en el mundo del arte del desafío de acercarse al arte a través de una serie de fotografías que trascienden lo habitual para acabar conviviendo con ellas Estamos ante una serie de obras en formato fotográfico que se bastan a sí mismas no exigen nada No hay distancia entre ellas y nosotrosEsta muestra de la Sala San Miguel de la Fundación Caja Castellón es la evidencia de que el respeto es nada creativo paraliza y cohíbe La nostalgia además transforma el presente en algo de segunda mano Una obra de arte debe ser superada por otra Porque los clásicos están ahí para ser revisados repensados a la altura del presente Por tanto no es creativo volver sobre lo ya hecho Continuar por ese camino no es más que reemplazar el buen hacer con el buen rehacer Hacerlo significa colapsar Más vale seguir avanzando y equivocarse que no evolucionarEl filósofo e historiador Thomas S Kuhn acuñó por primera vez la idea de los Cambios de Paradigma en la ciencia en su libro La estructura de las revoluciones científicas de 1962 Para Kunh la violación o distorsión de un lenguaje científico que previamente no era problemático es la piedra de toque de un cambio revolucionario Reflexionando sobre mi destino como coleccionista he encontrado paralelismos con estas teorías al detectar decisiones que no tienen que ver solamente con la compra de una obra másUno de esos momentos fue el de dar el paso de comprar la primera fotografía y otros momentos decisivos son los que intento determinar dentro de mi colección de fotografía Estas reflexiones y la posibilidad de ver colgada mi colección en espacios que no eran para los que en principio estaban destinadas ese proceso de extrañamiento de las obras es el que te permite tener otra visión de la colección y no solamente la de conjunto son algunas de las circunstancias que me ayudan a entender lo que ha hecho que mi colección adquiriese una especificidad y coherencia propiaEsta exposición demuestra que en el mundo del arte cualquier nuevo movimiento es una mutación La Fundación Caja Castellón desea ser audaz y universal cuestionándose continuamente a sí misma Sin riesgo existe el peligro de quedarse dormido Por todo ello la necesidad de mirar hacia el futuro para no repetirse La exposición es un paso más en ese camino para encarar el futuro Postura que coincide en cómo Henry Kissinger define el liderazgo Los líderes actúan en la intersección de dos ejes el primero entre el pasado y el futuro el segundo entre los valores perdurables y las aspiraciones de aquellos a los que lideran Juan Redón es arquitecto y coleccionista de arte
Translated Text: Change of paradigm The exhibition The exhibition Change of Paradigm is the consequence of my personal trip in the art world of the challenge of approaching art through a series of photographs that transcend the usual to end living with them We are faced with a series of works in photographic format that are sufficient to themselves do not require anything. There is no distance between them and us.There is no distance between them and us.There is no distance between them and us.This sample of the Sala San Miguel of the Fundaci San Miguel of the Fund Fund Caja Castellón is the evidence that respect is nothing creative paraly and cohibe The nostalgia also transforms the present into something of second hand A work of art must be overcome by another One work of art must be overcome by another.Because the classics are there to be reviewed to the height of the present.Therefore it is not creative to return to what has already been done.It is not more than to replace the good to do with the good to do.Do it means to collapse It is better to keep moving and wrong to go on and wrong than not to evolveThe philosopher Thomas S Kuhn S Kuhn Kuhn I am the touch of a touch of a revolutionary design of a revolutionary change of a revolutionary change I have coin I have been my destiny and I am the first destination I am the first I am thinking I am thinking and I am thinking I am thinking and I am thinking I am thinking I am thinking I am thinking I am thinking I am thinking I am thinking I am thinking I am thinking I am thinking I am thinking I am thinking I am thinking I am I am thinking I am I am I am I am I am I am I am I am I am I am I am I am I am I am I am I am I am I am I am I am I am I am I am I am I am I am I am I am I am I am I am I am I am I am I am I am I am I am I am I am I am I am I am I am I am I am I am I am I am I am I am I am I am I am I am I am I am I am I am I am I am I am I am I am I am I am I am I am I am I am I am I am I am I am I am I am I am I am I am I am I am I am I am I am I am I am I am I am

comprobar que Som Castelló está ahí El único partido de Castellón La verdad sin más a bocajarro Ningún otro partido tiene su sede central y fiscal en nuestra ciudad Todos dependen de fuera Y los vecinos nos preguntan se interesan nos trasladan sus inquietudes nos animan se quejan de los partidos de siempre y de sus discursos de peleaPatricia Mir Begoña Bellés Vicente Cornelles Alfonso Felip consistorio viciado por un ambiente que no se renueva desde hace 30 añosNuevos tiempos para la ciudad Nuevas personas cuyos jefes únicos son la ciudadanía de Castellón no la de Madrid o Valencia Y nuevos proyectos que convertirán a este espacio donde vivimos en algo ilusionante moderno digno Proyectos reales tangibles que saldrán adelante con esfuerzo y mucho trabajo como las cosas que más valor tienen Ya quedaron atrás esos tiempos de la promesa del Palacio de Congresos del proyecto invisible de Calatrava del chiringuito de la Ciudad de las Lenguas de las promesas vacías de la Marjaleria o de la remodelación del estadio Castalia Ahora llega la política real la tangible la que no trae mentiras ni está lejos de los vecinosNuevos tiempos para recuperar la democracia real la que se vive en la calle la que hace que los vecinos se quejen y el Ayuntamiento aporte soluciones La de un Ayuntamiento con unas Brigadas Municipales fuertes que den soluciones a los pequeños problemas La de un Grao conectado a Castellón ciudad donde la limpieza vuelva a ser seña e identidad El domingo 28 podemos lograrlo con Som CastellóPD No se puede retrasar la encuesta Hay que ver menos House of Cards y entender que la democracia pertenece a los ciudadanos Pacem relinquo vobis pacem meam do vobis Javier Más es candidato a la Alcaldía de Castellón por Som Castelló
